seo.title: Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Matte Finish – Majen
seo.description: Discover Majen’s unfilled honed vein cut travertine tiles — natural pores, soft matte finish, and linear veins for modern rustic designs. Authentic beauty, global quality.

unfilled-honed.h1: Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-honed.title: Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-honed.lead: Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen perfectly balance natural authenticity with modern refinement. Each tile retains its open pores for a raw, organic look, while the honed surface delivers a smooth, matte texture. The directional veins add structure and visual flow, making these tiles ideal for contemporary interiors that celebrate both nature and craftsmanship.
unfilled-honed.intro: Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen perfectly balance natural authenticity with modern refinement. Each tile retains its open pores for a raw, organic look, while the honed surface delivers a smooth, matte texture. The directional veins add structure and visual flow, making these tiles ideal for contemporary interiors that celebrate both nature and craftsmanship.
unfilled-honed.title2: What Are Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-honed.intro2: This travertine type combines unfilled, natural porosity with a honed matte finish. The result is a refined, tactile surface that maintains the stone’s authentic pores and vein patterns while offering a soft, satin feel. Unfilled honed vein cut travertine is the perfect choice for spaces where natural charm meets modern minimalism, blending texture, light, and timeless aesthetics.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Options
variants.text: Majen offers unfilled honed vein cut travertine tiles in multiple dimensions: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″,and Versailles Set. Smaller tiles accentuate texture, while larger slabs emphasize vein continuity and surface smoothness. Custom sizes are available upon request, ensuring precise integration into architectural designs of any scale.

description: The honed surface delivers a refined, soft texture that feels smooth yet authentically natural. It’s ideal for minimalist, calm spaces where understated elegance defines the design.
Unfilled pores highlight the stone’s natural character. The visible cavities and linear veins create organic depth, perfect for rustic-modern interiors or eco-inspired architecture.
Majen offers standard and custom sizes suitable for any project scale. Large slabs emphasize continuity, while smaller tiles add texture and rhythm to architectural compositions.
Majen’s eco-conscious quarrying and finishing methods ensure minimal waste and energy efficiency. Each slab is responsibly sourced and crafted for long-term environmental harmony.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled honed vein cut travertine is versatile for indoor floors, wall claddings, lobbies, bathrooms, and design accents. The matte surface and open pores allow natural air exchange, making it suitable for sustainable architecture. It fits both rustic and contemporary aesthetics, offering balance between raw material beauty and refined functionality in global design projects.
TextSection.text2: The honed surface gives a velvety matte appearance without gloss, reflecting light gently while maintaining organic integrity. The unfilled pores create subtle natural depth, enhancing visual texture. Each slab is precisely cut and calibrated for consistency, ensuring easy installation. The overall effect is warm, calm, and grounded — ideal for sophisticated, nature-inspired architecture.
TextSection.text3: Available in light beige, ivory, cream, and walnut tones, each tile exhibits subtle variations that reflect the natural stone’s formation. The honed finish enriches the colors without creating gloss, while open pores add authenticity. The combination of natural imperfection and matte precision makes every piece uniquely sophisticated, ideal for serene, minimalist environments.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Durability
TextSection.text4: Unfilled honed travertine requires minimal upkeep while maintaining a refined aesthetic. Regular cleaning with pH-neutral products preserves its texture and tone. Optional sealing helps reduce moisture absorption while retaining breathability. With proper care, Majen’s unfilled honed travertine ages gracefully, gaining character over time and maintaining timeless durability in both residential and commercial projects.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Travertine Partner?
TextSection.text5: Majen directly manages quarry sourcing, production, and export logistics, ensuring quality and consistency from origin to shipment. Each tile undergoes strict inspection for surface texture, tone balance, and calibration accuracy. With FOB and CIF delivery options, sustainable quarrying, and reinforced packaging, Majen is trusted by architects and distributors in over 40 countries.

seo.title: Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Premium Natural Stone – Majen
seo.description: Explore Majen’s filled honed vein cut travertine tiles — smooth, matte-finished slabs for luxury walls and floors. Precisely cut, filled, and globally exported with consistent quality.

filled-honed.h1: Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-honed.title: Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-honed.lead: Majen supplies Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles directly from our Uşak–Ulubey quarry in Turkey. The stone is sliced parallel to the bedding layers to reveal elegant, continuous veins; pores are professionally filled to achieve a dense, smooth structure. A precise honed finish delivers a refined matte surface with excellent flatness, color harmony, and slip comfort—ideal for upscale interiors, long corridors, wall cladding, and large-format floors. FOB/CIF worldwide export with reinforced packaging.
filled-honed.intro: Majen supplies Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles directly from our Uşak–Ulubey quarry in Turkey. The stone is sliced parallel to the bedding layers to reveal elegant, continuous veins; pores are professionally filled to achieve a dense, smooth structure. A precise honed finish delivers a refined matte surface with excellent flatness, color harmony, and slip comfort—ideal for upscale interiors, long corridors, wall cladding, and large-format floors. FOB/CIF worldwide export with reinforced packaging.
filled-honed.title2: What Are Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-honed.intro2: This travertine type is crafted by filling natural pores with high-quality resin or cement to achieve a dense surface, then honing for a refined matte texture. The process maintains the stone’s elegant linear pattern while enhancing durability and resistance. Filled honed vein cut travertine combines beauty and functionality, making it ideal for luxury interiors, hospitality spaces, and large architectural installations.

variants.title: Surface Characteristics and Texture
variants.text: The honed finish gives the stone a soft, satin touch while reducing glare, perfect for contemporary designs seeking a calm aesthetic. The filled process eliminates natural cavities, providing smoother texture and easier maintenance. Majen ensures each slab is processed with precision calibration, resulting in consistent tone, thickness, and seamless installation for high-end international projects.

description: The honed finish delivers a luxurious matte texture that feels soft underfoot. It reflects minimal light, creating a calm and sophisticated atmosphere perfect for contemporary interiors and minimalist architectural styles.
Filling the stone’s native pores improves its density and resistance to wear. This process increases structural performance, ensuring long-lasting beauty and strength even in demanding applications.

Majen provides a variety of sizes, from compact 8″x8″ tiles to extra-large 48″x110″ slabs. Each dimension is calibrated to perfection, ensuring seamless installation and design flexibility across all project scales.
Majen practices eco-conscious quarrying with water recycling and low-emission processing. Every step, from extraction to export, meets international environmental and safety standards.

TextSection.text1: Filled honed vein cut travertine is ideal for interior flooring, wall cladding, bathrooms, lobbies, and countertops. Its linear vein structure complements both modern and classical architecture. Designers appreciate its balance of warmth, texture, and durability — making it suitable for luxury villas, commercial buildings, and hospitality projects that require both visual harmony and practical resilience.
TextSection.text2: Majen offers a complete range of filled honed vein cut travertine tile sizes, including: 8″×8″, 12″×12″, 12″×24″, 16″×16″, 18″×18″, 24″×24″, 24″×48″, 48″×110″, and Versailles Set. These standardized formats ensure flexibility for flooring patterns and wall applications. Large-size slabs are ideal for achieving continuity in expansive spaces, while smaller cuts offer refined detailing for compact areas. Custom dimensions are available upon request.
TextSection.text3: Majen’s filled honed vein cut travertine tiles feature light beige, ivory, and cream tones, enhanced by the directional movement of vein patterns. The filled surface preserves the stone’s natural essence while creating a uniform, modern appearance. Subtle color variations across slabs add depth and sophistication, making every installation unique and naturally harmonious.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Performance
TextSection.text4: Filled honed travertine requires minimal maintenance. Regular cleaning with pH-neutral stone cleaner keeps the surface pristine, while periodic resealing enhances protection. The filled surface minimizes water absorption, making it ideal for high-moisture areas. With proper care, Majen’s tiles retain their smooth finish and refined tone for decades in both residential and commercial spaces.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Trusted Export Partner?
TextSection.text5: Majen operates as a direct quarry supplier, providing total control over extraction, cutting, and finishing. Each tile is inspected for vein consistency, color tone, and surface density. With FOB and CIF export options, reinforced packaging, and global logistics expertise, Majen ensures safe and efficient worldwide delivery — trusted by architects, importers, and developers across continents.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What does “filled honed” mean in travertine tiles?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: It refers to filling natural pores with resin or cement for a smooth surface, then honing for a matte finish. This enhances strength and delivers a sleek appearance.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Are filled honed travertine tiles good for bathrooms?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Yes, the filled process reduces water absorption, making them ideal for bathrooms, spas, and kitchens where moisture resistance is essential.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Can I order custom sizes?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Absolutely. Majen offers standard sizes and custom dimensions tailored to your project’s needs for both residential and commercial applications.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_header: How should I clean and maintain filled travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Clean regularly with a neutral pH stone cleaner and reseal every few years. Avoid acidic or abrasive chemicals that can dull the finish.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: What makes Majen’s tiles suitable for global export?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Each tile is precisely calibrated, securely packed, and accompanied by complete export documentation under FOB or CIF terms for global delivery.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_header: What’s the difference between filled honed and unfilled finishes?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Filled honed tiles have sealed pores and a matte texture, while unfilled ones preserve the stone’s natural holes for a rustic, textured look.

seo.title: Filled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Premium Glossy Finish – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled polished vein cut travertine tiles deliver glossy, elegant surfaces with linear patterns. Perfect for luxury interiors, precisely cut, and globally exported with top-tier quality.

filled-polished.h1: Filled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-polished.title: Filled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-polished.lead: Filled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody luxury and timeless sophistication. Each slab is filled to create a dense, seamless surface, then polished to achieve a brilliant, mirror-like finish. The linear veins flow elegantly across the stone, enhancing spatial continuity and light reflection. Ideal for grand interiors and premium projects, these tiles combine natural stone strength with refined architectural beauty.
filled-polished.intro: Filled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody luxury and timeless sophistication. Each slab is filled to create a dense, seamless surface, then polished to achieve a brilliant, mirror-like finish. The linear veins flow elegantly across the stone, enhancing spatial continuity and light reflection. Ideal for grand interiors and premium projects, these tiles combine natural stone strength with refined architectural beauty.
filled-polished.title2: What Are Filled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-polished.intro2: This variety of travertine is produced by filling natural pores with durable resin or cement, followed by mechanical polishing to a glossy finish. The result is a dense, smooth surface that reflects light beautifully. The linear vein pattern emphasizes motion and texture, making it a preferred choice for architects seeking balance between natural elegance and modern luxury in high-end environments.

variants.title: Surface Features and Texture Quality
variants.text: Polished surfaces highlight the natural coloration of travertine while creating a smooth and reflective finish. The filled structure ensures durability and minimizes porosity, reducing maintenance needs. Majen’s advanced polishing process enhances color depth, ensuring consistent tone and elegant shine. Each tile undergoes precision calibration to guarantee flawless surface quality and perfect alignment during installation.

description: The polished surface provides a luminous reflection, enhancing both natural and artificial light. Perfect for luxury interiors, it delivers unmatched brightness and a sophisticated, elegant visual appeal.
By filling natural pores, the stone achieves a denser, more resilient surface. This process ensures even polishing and minimizes maintenance, creating a flawless look that stands the test of time.
Majen offers multiple tile dimensions to fit diverse design needs—from 8″x8″ accents to expansive 48″x110″ slabs. Each size is precision-calibrated for seamless installation in modern projects.
Majen guarantees safe, timely global delivery. All tiles are securely packed in reinforced wooden crates with moisture protection, ensuring quality preservation during long-distance transport.

TextSection.text1: Filled polished vein cut travertine is the perfect material for luxury flooring, wall panels, countertops, and hotel lobbies. Its bright, reflective surface adds depth and luminosity to interiors, making spaces appear larger and more sophisticated. The directional veins provide visual flow and harmony, ideal for both modern and classic architectural projects requiring elegant aesthetics with durable functionality.
TextSection.text2: Majen’s filled polished vein cut travertine tiles come in multiple size options: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″, and Versailles Set. These dimensions offer versatility for creative layouts — from geometric flooring to seamless wall cladding. Large tiles deliver continuous patterns with fewer joints, while smaller formats enhance design detail and precision. Custom sizes are available for bespoke architectural needs.
TextSection.text3: Available in luxurious tones of ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut, Majen’s filled polished travertine enhances interiors with warmth and depth. The polished surface amplifies light, while filled pores preserve the stone’s natural structure. Subtle tonal movement across the veins creates a dynamic yet cohesive aesthetic — ideal for elegant, high-end interiors worldwide.
TextSection.header4: MMaintenance & Care Tips
TextSection.text4: To maintain its brilliance, clean polished travertine with a soft cloth and neutral pH stone cleaner. Regular resealing helps retain its glossy finish and protect against staining. Avoid acidic cleaners or abrasive pads. With proper care, Majen’s filled polished tiles preserve their radiant appearance and structural integrity for decades, even in high-traffic environments.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Travertine Partner?
TextSection.text5: Majen controls every production stage, from quarry extraction to final polishing, ensuring consistency, quality, and reliability. Each tile is hand-inspected for clarity, color tone, and surface perfection. With global FOB and CIF export options, reinforced packaging, and responsive customer service, Majen is a trusted partner for architects, builders, and importers worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What makes filled polished travertine unique?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: It combines filled density with a polished surface, offering a smooth, reflective finish that highlights natural vein movement and enhances spatial brightness.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Is polished travertine slippery?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Polished finishes are glossy, so they’re best used for dry indoor areas. For outdoor or wet zones, a honed or brushed finish is recommended for slip resistance.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: What sizes are available for filled polished travertine tiles?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Majen offers 8″x8″ up to 48″x110″ tiles, plus Versailles Sets and custom sizes upon request to suit different architectural layouts.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_header: How do you clean polished travertine surfaces?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Use a soft cloth and neutral pH cleaner. Avoid acidic or abrasive products. Regular resealing will maintain its high-gloss finish and protect from moisture.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: Can polished travertine be used on walls?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Yes, it’s ideal for wall cladding in lobbies, bathrooms, and decorative accent walls, adding depth and luxury to vertical surfaces.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_header: Does Majen provide international export services?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Absolutely. Majen exports worldwide with full documentation and reliable logistics using FOB and CIF terms to ensure safe delivery.

seo.title: Unfilled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Shine & Authentic Texture – Majen
seo.description: Discover Majen’s unfilled polished vein cut travertine tiles — open-pore texture, glossy surface, and timeless linear veins. The perfect balance of raw beauty and luxury.

unfilled-polished.h1: Unfilled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-polished.title: Unfilled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-polished.lead: Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen perfectly balance natural authenticity with modern refinement. Each tile retains its open pores for a raw, organic look, while the honed surface delivers a smooth, matte texture. The directional veins add structure and visual flow, making these tiles ideal for contemporary interiors that celebrate both nature and craftsmanship.
unfilled-polished.intro: Unfilled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen represent a refined blend of natural authenticity and architectural elegance. Each tile preserves its open pores for a raw, organic look, while the polished surface adds luxurious sheen and depth. The directional veins create a sense of movement and continuity, perfect for interiors where natural charm meets high-end sophistication.
unfilled-polished.title2: What Are Unfilled Polished Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-polished.intro2: TUnfilled polished travertine is crafted by slicing the stone along its natural bedding veins, leaving pores open for breathability while polishing the surface for brilliance. This dual character — natural texture beneath a glossy surface — gives the stone a striking, multidimensional look. It’s ideal for designers seeking materials that combine raw beauty with elegant reflectivity.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Customization
variants.text: Majen offers unfilled polished vein cut travertine tiles in these formats: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″,and Versailles Set. Standardized thickness ensures seamless installation, while custom sizes can be produced upon request. Larger slabs highlight vein direction, while smaller tiles emphasize pattern contrast and natural texture.

description: The polished finish enhances the stone’s natural veins and light reflection while keeping pores open. It creates an elegant, luminous surface that radiates warmth and authenticity.
Unfilled texture brings organic depth, while polishing adds sophistication. This contrast offers a rare balance — natural, tactile beauty wrapped in a luxurious, modern presentation.
From compact 8″x8″ tiles to large 48″x110″ slabs, Majen provides precise sizing for every project. Custom dimensions ensure perfect visual flow in any architectural layout.
Majen’s eco-friendly quarrying, efficient production, and global logistics ensure responsible sourcing and consistent quality across all international markets.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled polished vein cut travertine is ideal for interior walls, decorative floors, feature panels, and luxury commercial spaces. Its unique mix of natural porosity and reflective sheen enhances visual depth, making rooms feel expansive and luminous. Designers use it to create sophisticated, tactile environments that merge timeless elegance with authentic material honesty.
TextSection.text2: The polished surface reveals the stone’s full color intensity and fine details of its veins, while the unfilled pores preserve its natural identity. Each slab reflects light subtly across its linear patterns, offering contrast between smooth reflection and natural texture. Majen’s precision finishing ensures even polish and consistent tone across every piece, making it a statement in modern design.
TextSection.text3: Available in ivory, beige, silver, and cream hues, each tile features fine linear veins that reflect light dynamically. The polished surface intensifies natural tones, while the unfilled cavities add organic texture and individuality. This dual contrast makes every piece unique, allowing spaces to achieve both luxury and authenticity in design.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Surface Care
TextSection.text4: Despite its refined look, unfilled polished travertine is easy to maintain. Regular dusting and cleaning with neutral pH cleaners preserve its brightness and texture. Occasional sealing helps protect the surface while keeping natural pores breathable. With proper care, these tiles maintain their glossy brilliance and natural warmth for decades.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Stone Partner?
TextSection.text5: Majen’s direct quarry sourcing and in-house finishing ensure the highest standards of consistency and beauty. Each tile is inspected for surface clarity, polish depth, and vein precision. With FOB and CIF global export options, secure wooden packaging, and complete documentation, Majen guarantees reliable international supply for architects and distributors worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Filled polished travertine has sealed pores for smoothness, while unfilled polished retains natural cavities for a more organic texture and depth.

seo.title: Filled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Texture & Strength – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled brushed vein cut travertine tiles combine natural warmth with durability. Perfect for interior and exterior designs — eco-sourced, filled, brushed, and globally exported.

filled-brushed.h1: Unfilled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
filled-brushed.title: Filled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-brushed.lead: Filled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen blend natural character with refined craftsmanship. Each slab is filled for strength and smoothness, then brushed to enhance its organic texture and subtle depth. The linear vein pattern creates a natural flow, while the brushed finish offers a tactile surface perfect for interiors seeking warmth and authenticity. Ideal for modern rustic, luxury, and timeless architectural designs.
filled-brushed.intro: Filled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen blend natural character with refined craftsmanship. Each slab is filled for strength and smoothness, then brushed to enhance its organic texture and subtle depth. The linear vein pattern creates a natural flow, while the brushed finish offers a tactile surface perfect for interiors seeking warmth and authenticity. Ideal for modern rustic, luxury, and timeless architectural designs.
filled-brushed.title2: What Are Filled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-brushed.intro2: This stone type combines a filled structure for density with a brushed finish that highlights natural surface variations. The brushing process softens the stone’s texture, giving it a naturally aged appearance while preserving its vein direction. Filled brushed travertine provides both comfort underfoot and superior resilience, making it suitable for projects balancing contemporary design with organic charm.

variants.title: Texture and Surface Characteristics
variants.text: Majen offers Ivory, Light, and Antico tones to suit diverse design visions. Ivory provides classic cream elegance; Light delivers calm, neutral beige; and Antico adds earthy contrast with timeless warmth. All colors are sourced from the same quarry layer, ensuring hue consistency and vein continuity across floors and walls. These natural shades create balanced, harmonious spaces that age gracefully over time.

description: The brushed surface enhances the stone’s natural touch, offering a warm, tactile experience underfoot. Its soft matte tone brings organic depth and texture to interiors and outdoor living areas.

By sealing natural pores, filled travertine provides increased durability and water resistance. The result is a denser, more stable tile ideal for long-term architectural use across multiple environments.
Available in a complete range of sizes, from compact formats to expansive slabs. This flexibility allows designers to craft creative layouts that balance movement, pattern, and continuity.
Majen implements eco-conscious quarrying and finishing processes. Each slab is responsibly sourced, with water recycling systems and optimized logistics ensuring environmental sustainability.

TextSection.text1: The unfilled brushed finish enhances natural texture while maintaining tactile comfort and grip. Open pores express the stone’s authenticity, and the brushed treatment creates gentle relief ideal for barefoot comfort. The matte surface reduces glare and diffuses light softly, making it perfect for bright, serene spaces. Majen’s precision brushing ensures even texture depth and controlled roughness across every slab.
TextSection.text2: Majen offers filled brushed vein cut travertine tiles in various dimensions: ....., and Versailles Set. These options allow flexible layout design — smaller tiles for intricate detailing, larger slabs for visual continuity. Custom sizes can be produced upon request to match architectural specifications for global projects.
TextSection.text3: Filled brushed travertine tiles feature elegant tones of light beige, cream, and silver. The brushing process softens color contrast while enhancing the natural linear movement of veins. Each slab presents unique shading and texture, resulting in a naturally cohesive design. This balanced palette makes it ideal for spaces aiming to blend warmth, modernity, and authenticity.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Surface Care
TextSection.text4: Brushed travertine is easy to maintain. Regular cleaning with a neutral stone cleaner preserves its matte texture and soft sheen. The filled surface reduces dirt absorption, while sealing enhances protection against moisture. With proper care, these tiles maintain their natural look and strength for years, even in areas with heavy daily use or exposure to changing temperatures.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen sources its travertine directly from the Uşak–Ulubey quarry in Turkey, ensuring premium quality, consistency, and reliable export logistics. Every tile is selected for color uniformity, vein precision, and surface finish. With FOB and CIF shipping options, reinforced wooden packaging, and meticulous documentation, Majen guarantees seamless delivery and long-term satisfaction for global clients.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What makes filled brushed travertine unique?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: It combines a brushed texture with filled pores, creating a dense yet naturally aged appearance — durable, slip-resistant, and ideal for rustic luxury designs.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Is brushed travertine suitable for outdoor spaces?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Yes. The textured surface offers natural slip resistance, making it perfect for terraces, pool decks, and garden paths exposed to varying weather conditions.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: How is brushed travertine maintained?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Clean with a mild pH-neutral solution, reseal occasionally, and avoid harsh chemicals. Regular care keeps its natural surface looking elegant and smooth.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Majen offers tiles from 8'x8' up to 48'x110', including Versailles Sets. Custom dimensions are available for bespoke architectural needs.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: What’s the benefit of the filled process?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Filling the stone’s natural pores increases strength, reduces moisture absorption, and provides a smoother texture while preserving natural aesthetics.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Yes. Majen exports worldwide under FOB and CIF terms, with reinforced packaging and full export documentation for seamless international shipment.

seo.title: Unfilled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Textured Elegance – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled brushed vein cut travertine tiles feature open pores and a soft brushed finish for timeless natural beauty. Ideal for modern rustic interiors and outdoor designs.

unfilled-brushed.h1: Unfilled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-brushed.title: Unfilled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-brushed.lead: Unfilled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen perfectly balance natural authenticity with modern refinement. Each tile retains its open pores for a raw, organic look, while the honed surface delivers a smooth, matte texture. The directional veins add structure and visual flow, making these tiles ideal for contemporary interiors that celebrate both nature and craftsmanship.
unfilled-brushed.intro: Unfilled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen express pure natural texture enhanced with artisan brushing. Each tile retains its open pores for organic depth, while the brushed finish softens the surface, creating a warm, tactile feel. The linear vein pattern flows gracefully, making these tiles ideal for interiors that balance natural charm, comfort, and timeless elegance.
unfilled-brushed.title2: What Are Unfilled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-brushed.intro2: Unfilled brushed travertine combines the untouched beauty of open pores with a brushed surface that enhances texture and natural tone. The brushing process gently polishes the stone without closing its pores, resulting in a surface that feels soft, rustic, and sophisticated. It’s the perfect choice for architects seeking a natural yet refined stone finish for global projects.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Options
variants.text: Majen produces unfilled brushed vein cut travertine tiles in a wide range of sizes:  8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″, and Versailles Set. These sizes allow flexible design layouts — smaller formats for intricate detailing, and larger slabs for open, continuous patterns. Custom dimensions are available to match any project’s scale and design vision.

description: The brushed finish enhances the stone’s tactile quality, offering a soft, comfortable surface underfoot. Ideal for interiors emphasizing warmth, authenticity, and natural character.
Open pores allow natural air flow and moisture regulation. This property makes brushed travertine an excellent choice for eco-conscious, naturally ventilated architectural spaces.
Majen offers a full range of standard and custom sizes. From small-format tiles to large architectural slabs, every piece is crafted with precision and consistency.
Majen adheres to responsible quarrying, water recycling, and low-emission production methods, ensuring long-term environmental stewardship and quality assurance.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled brushed vein cut travertine tiles are versatile for interior floors, wall cladding, spa areas, courtyards, and terraces. Their soft texture and anti-slip surface make them suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. They add warmth and authenticity to spaces, harmonizing with wood, glass, and metal finishes — perfect for natural, sustainable, and timeless architectural concepts.
TextSection.text2: The brushed finish reveals the subtle reliefs and veins of the stone, creating a sense of movement and depth. Open pores provide breathability and organic character, while brushing refines the touch and harmonizes the tones. Each slab is precisely cut and calibrated for consistency, ensuring easy installation and lasting elegance in residential and commercial designs.
TextSection.text3: Available in ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut, each tile displays natural color shifts that highlight the stone’s linear veins. The brushed surface adds depth to tones, enhancing the stone’s tactile quality. Subtle light interplay across the texture provides a warm, lived-in aesthetic — ideal for modern rustic or Mediterranean-style interiors.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Durability
TextSection.text4: Unfilled brushed travertine is naturally resilient and easy to maintain. Regular cleaning with a neutral pH stone cleaner preserves its tone and softness. Occasional sealing helps protect against moisture and dust while maintaining breathability. With proper care, Majen’s brushed travertine retains its authentic surface and structural strength for decades.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen combines quarry expertise, precision craftsmanship, and sustainable production. Each tile is inspected for vein alignment, color uniformity, and textural consistency. With FOB and CIF export options, reinforced packaging, and responsive international logistics, Majen ensures reliable, high-quality delivery to architects, designers, and distributors worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What is unfilled brushed travertine?

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Is brushed travertine suitable for outdoor use?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Yes. Its slightly rough texture provides natural slip resistance, making it perfect for terraces, pathways, and pool surrounds.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: How is it different from honed or polished travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Brushed travertine has a soft texture with natural depth, while honed is matte smooth and polished is glossy. Brushed offers the most tactile natural finish.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Majen offers sizes from 8″x8″ to 48″x110″, plus Versailles Sets and custom cuts for architectural projects.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Yes, sealing is recommended to reduce moisture absorption while preserving the natural texture and color variation.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Absolutely. Majen exports globally under FOB and CIF terms, ensuring safe packaging, documentation, and timely logistics worldwide.

seo.title: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Authentic Matte Finish – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled natural vein cut travertine tiles combine strength with raw texture. Elegant linear veins and soft matte surface ideal for natural interiors and outdoor spaces.

filled-natural.h1: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-natural.title: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-natural.lead: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen offer the perfect harmony between natural aesthetics and structural performance. Each tile is filled for durability and density, yet retains its authentic, unpolished surface texture. The linear vein patterns create a sense of rhythm and balance, ideal for architectural spaces seeking understated elegance. These tiles bring organic beauty, warmth, and timeless design to any global project.
filled-natural.intro: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen offer the perfect harmony between natural aesthetics and structural performance. Each tile is filled for durability and density, yet retains its authentic, unpolished surface texture. The linear vein patterns create a sense of rhythm and balance, ideal for architectural spaces seeking understated elegance. These tiles bring organic beauty, warmth, and timeless design to any global project.
filled-natural.title2: What Are Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-natural.intro2: Filled natural travertine combines the smooth consistency of filled pores with the raw charm of a natural finish. The result is a dense surface that preserves the stone’s true character and texture. Each slab reveals directional veins unique to vein-cut travertine, adding visual depth and movement. Perfect for minimalist and organic architectural concepts, this stone unites authenticity with functionality.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Design Flexibility
variants.text: Majen offers filled natural vein cut travertine tiles in standard and custom sizes: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″and Versailles Set. Standardized thickness ensures easy installation, while multiple formats support creative layouts. Larger slabs enhance vein continuity, and smaller cuts allow detailed design solutions tailored for architectural balance.

description: The natural finish preserves the stone’s raw surface feel, offering authentic texture and organic appeal. Perfect for spaces that value natural light, balance, and material honesty.
Filling the native pores enhances the stone’s structural integrity and durability. This ensures smooth installation, reduced maintenance, and long-lasting surface stability.
Each slab showcases soft beige and ivory tones with continuous linear veins. Subtle shading creates depth and warmth, delivering a naturally elegant visual rhythm.
Majen follows environmentally responsible extraction methods and water recycling systems, ensuring sustainability while maintaining the superior quality of every slab.

TextSection.text1: Filled natural vein cut travertine tiles are ideal for wall cladding, flooring, bathrooms, terraces, and decorative facades. Their non-reflective texture and filled durability make them suitable for both modern and traditional spaces. These tiles are favored for natural-themed interiors, outdoor living areas, and boutique projects seeking authenticity and lasting visual harmony.
TextSection.text2: The natural finish highlights the stone’s raw surface, showcasing subtle pits, color shifts, and natural veining. The filled process ensures that these features remain smooth to the touch without compromising strength. Majen’s precision finishing brings out the stone’s natural tones while maintaining consistency across slabs. The result is a surface that feels both tactile and timeless — elegant in its simplicity.
TextSection.text3: These tiles come in serene tones of ivory, beige, light walnut, and cream, reflecting the stone’s natural formation layers. The unpolished surface softens reflections and enhances tactile appeal, making every tile unique. Subtle color variations along the veins emphasize depth and authenticity — a perfect choice for eco-conscious, organic-style designs.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Longevity
TextSection.text4: Filled natural travertine is low-maintenance and built to last. Clean with a neutral pH cleaner to maintain its soft matte surface. The filled pores prevent deep water absorption, ensuring resistance to wear and staining. With periodic sealing, Majen’s natural travertine retains its texture, durability, and timeless beauty for decades in both indoor and outdoor applications.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen sources its travertine directly from Turkish quarries and manages every stage — extraction, filling, cutting, and export. Each tile is inspected for tone balance, vein direction, and surface texture. With FOB and CIF shipping, eco-friendly quarrying, and reinforced packaging, Majen guarantees consistent, premium-quality stone for international clients across all markets.

seo.title: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Raw Authentic Texture – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled natural vein cut travertine tiles preserve pure texture and linear veins. Raw beauty, authentic tone, and global quality — perfect for natural, rustic designs.

unfilled-natural.h1: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-natural.title: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-natural.lead: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen showcase the stone’s pure, untouched essence. Each slab preserves its natural pores, linear veins, and authentic surface texture without additional filling or polishing. The result is a raw, organic appearance that highlights the stone’s geological story. Perfect for natural-themed architecture, rustic interiors, and spaces that celebrate authentic material beauty.
unfilled-natural.intro: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen showcase the stone’s pure, untouched essence. Each slab preserves its natural pores, linear veins, and authentic surface texture without additional filling or polishing. The result is a raw, organic appearance that highlights the stone’s geological story. Perfect for natural-themed architecture, rustic interiors, and spaces that celebrate authentic material beauty.
unfilled-natural.title2: What Are Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-natural.intro2: Unfilled travertine is cut along its natural bedding layers, revealing open pores and linear veins formed by mineral deposits. Unlike filled or polished variants, it retains its porous structure for a truly natural texture. This authentic finish emphasizes the stone’s origin and tactile depth, ideal for architects seeking sustainable, organic materials with timeless character and visual honesty.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Natural Options
variants.text: Majen offers unfilled natural vein cut travertine tiles in these formats: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″,and Versailles Set. Tiles can be customized upon request for unique architectural requirements. Smaller formats highlight texture variations, while large slabs emphasize vein flow and stone continuity — perfect for authentic, statement designs.

description: Unfilled travertine maintains its original pores and raw surface, showcasing authentic beauty. Its organic texture brings natural warmth and timeless elegance to architectural environments.
The porous structure allows natural air flow and moisture balance, making it perfect for eco-conscious designs. It contributes to healthier indoor climates and sustainable building aesthetics.
From compact tiles to expansive slabs, Majen offers all standard and custom dimensions. Each tile is carefully cut and calibrated to highlight vein continuity and surface authenticity.
Majen manages every stage, from extraction to finishing and logistics. Responsible sourcing and expert handling guarantee consistent quality and smooth global delivery.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled natural vein cut travertine is ideal for wall facades, rustic floors, courtyards, garden pathways, and accent walls. Its breathable, porous surface regulates humidity naturally, making it suitable for eco-friendly architecture. Designers choose it for organic projects that value authenticity, raw texture, and connection with nature. It performs beautifully in both outdoor and ventilated interior settings.
TextSection.text2: The unfilled natural surface preserves natural cavities and subtle irregularities that add depth and uniqueness. Its linear veins create gentle movement across each tile, while the untouched texture delivers a raw, earthy charm. Majen’s precision cutting ensures consistent thickness and alignment, allowing this naturally imperfect material to install seamlessly in both classic and modern contexts.
TextSection.text3: Unfilled natural travertine comes in warm beige, light walnut, and creamy ivory tones, each defined by unique mineral layers. Natural pores create soft contrasts and depth, accentuating the stone’s organic texture. The unprocessed finish adds a tactile, timeless quality to every slab, blending beautifully with wood, metal, and natural light for serene, biophilic environments.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Surface Care
TextSection.text4: Unfilled natural travertine requires simple but mindful care. Clean regularly with a neutral pH stone cleaner and avoid acidic products. Occasional sealing helps reduce dust accumulation and moisture absorption without altering its natural texture. With minimal maintenance, these tiles retain their original charm for years, gracefully aging into an even more authentic surface over time.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen ensures authenticity from quarry to export by sourcing directly from premium Turkish travertine deposits. Every unfilled tile is inspected for vein direction, structural integrity, and color harmony. With FOB and CIF shipping, secure packaging, and global logistics support, Majen delivers reliable supply and enduring natural beauty to architects and distributors worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What does “unfilled natural” mean in travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: It means the stone’s natural pores are left open, and the surface is unpolished, preserving its authentic texture and appearance.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Is unfilled travertine suitable for outdoor areas?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Yes. Its breathable structure and slip-resistant texture make it ideal for outdoor applications like patios, facades, and garden paths.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: How does unfilled differ from filled travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Filled travertine has its pores sealed for smoothness, while unfilled retains its natural cavities, offering a more rustic and organic look.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_header: What sizes can I order from Majen?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Majen provides standard sizes from 8″x8″ to 48″x110″, plus Versailles Sets and custom dimensions for architectural flexibility.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: How do I maintain unfilled travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Clean with neutral stone cleaner, reseal periodically, and avoid acidic substances. This keeps the stone’s texture intact and naturally elegant.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Yes. Majen exports globally with FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced packaging, and complete export documentation for smooth worldwide delivery.

seo.title: Filled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Rustic Natural Finish – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled tumbled vein cut travertine tiles offer rustic charm with modern durability. Soft, aged texture with filled strength — ideal for luxury interiors and outdoor designs.

filled-tumbled.h1: Unfilled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
filled-tumbled.title: Filled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-tumbled.lead: Filled Brushed Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen blend natural character with refined craftsmanship. Each slab is filled for strength and smoothness, then brushed to enhance its organic texture and subtle depth. The linear vein pattern creates a natural flow, while the brushed finish offers a tactile surface perfect for interiors seeking warmth and authenticity. Ideal for modern rustic, luxury, and timeless architectural designs.
filled-tumbled.intro: Filled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen combine old-world charm with modern craftsmanship. Each slab is filled for structural density, then tumbled to achieve a soft, weathered texture. The result is a naturally aged, tactile surface that highlights the linear vein pattern while offering a timeless, rustic appearance. Perfect for interior and exterior projects that value authenticity and elegance.
filled-tumbled.title2: What Are Filled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-tumbled.intro2: This travertine variety is produced by filling the stone’s natural cavities with resin or cement for strength, followed by tumbling — a process that rounds edges and softens textures. The combination enhances durability and delivers a naturally antiqued aesthetic. Filled tumbled vein cut travertine tiles offer a refined balance between rustic character and long-lasting performance, ideal for global architectural projects.

variants.title: Surface Texture and Finish Quality
variants.text: The tumbled finish creates a gentle, aged look with subtly distressed edges, giving spaces a sense of depth and history. Filled pores ensure smoothness and stability while retaining organic charm. Majen’s precision production guarantees consistent tone, calibrated thickness, and a harmonious linear pattern. These tiles are durable, visually warm, and perfect for both traditional and modern rustic interiors.

description: The tumbled surface gives each tile a soft, antique texture with rounded edges. This natural look adds warmth and authenticity to spaces, ideal for timeless, rustic, or Mediterranean-inspired interiors.

Filling the stone’s native pores enhances its strength, prevents water penetration, and supports long-term durability. Perfect for both interior and exterior applications requiring resilience and stability.
Majen offers a complete range of tile sizes to accommodate diverse layout needs — from detailed small formats to expansive slabs that create continuous patterns and smooth architectural flow.
Majen prioritizes sustainability through eco-conscious quarrying, water recycling, and low-emission production methods. Each slab is responsibly extracted and processed for a greener building future.

TextSection.text1: The unfilled brushed finish enhances natural texture while maintaining tactile comfort and grip. Open pores express the stone’s authenticity, and the brushed treatment creates gentle relief ideal for barefoot comfort. The matte surface reduces glare and diffuses light softly, making it perfect for bright, serene spaces. Majen’s precision brushing ensures even texture depth and controlled roughness across every slab.
TextSection.text2: Majen offers filled tumbled vein cut travertine tiles in the following standard sizes: .....,and Versailles Set. These formats accommodate diverse installation patterns, from classical Versailles layouts to sleek linear arrangements. Custom cuts are also available, allowing designers to adapt sizes for unique global design concepts.
TextSection.header3: Color Range and Natural Aesthetic Appeal
TextSection.text3: Filled tumbled vein cut travertine features warm neutral hues — ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut. The tumbled process slightly mutes tones, enhancing depth and natural variation across veins. The subtle blend of smoothness and irregularity gives each slab a handcrafted charm, making it an ideal surface for rustic luxury interiors and Mediterranean-style architecture.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Longevity
TextSection.text4: These tiles are designed for easy care and long-term durability. Clean with a soft cloth and pH-neutral cleaner to maintain their natural beauty. The filled surface resists moisture absorption, while tumbling minimizes edge chipping. With periodic sealing, Majen’s filled tumbled travertine remains structurally strong and visually appealing even after years of use in indoor or outdoor conditions.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Trusted Travertine Exporter?
TextSection.text5: Majen is a globally recognized Turkish supplier offering quarry-direct sourcing, precision finishing, and reliable export logistics. Each tile is inspected for color balance, vein direction, and finishing quality. With FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced packaging, and transparent documentation, Majen ensures fast, secure, and consistent delivery to international distributors and project developers.

seo.title: Unfilled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles | Rustic Natural Elegance – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled tumbled vein cut travertine tiles feature open pores and aged texture. Naturally breathable, slip-resistant, and ideal for timeless rustic architecture.

unfilled-tumbled.h1: Unfilled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-tumbled.title: Unfilled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-tumbled.lead: Unfilled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody the authentic spirit of natural stone. Each tile preserves its open pores for raw texture while being tumbled to achieve a weathered, timeworn appearance. The linear vein structure adds architectural balance and natural rhythm, making these tiles perfect for rustic, Mediterranean, and heritage-inspired designs that value natural character.
unfilled-tumbled.intro: Unfilled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody the authentic spirit of natural stone. Each tile preserves its open pores for raw texture while being tumbled to achieve a weathered, timeworn appearance. The linear vein structure adds architectural balance and natural rhythm, making these tiles perfect for rustic, Mediterranean, and heritage-inspired designs that value natural character.
unfilled-tumbled.title2: What Are Unfilled Tumbled Vein Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-tumbled.intro2: Unfilled tumbled travertine is created by cutting the stone along its bedding veins, leaving natural pores open and tumbling the surface to soften edges and textures. The process gives each tile a vintage, handcrafted look while maintaining organic depth. This unique combination of natural roughness and gentle finish creates a timeless surface ideal for eco-friendly and traditional architecture.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Options
variants.text: Majen manufactures unfilled tumbled vein cut travertine tiles in the following standard sizes:  8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″, and Versailles Set. Each format provides design flexibility — smaller tiles enhance textural rhythm, while large slabs create continuous, vein-driven flow. Custom sizes are also available upon request to meet project-specific needs.

description: The tumbled surface creates a soft, antique appearance with rounded edges. It captures the natural charm of aged stone while offering durability and slip resistance for indoor and outdoor use.
Open pores allow natural air circulation and prevent trapped moisture. This breathable structure enhances longevity and adds organic warmth to every architectural space.
Majen provides multiple size formats for creative layouts — from classic Versailles patterns to expansive modern slabs. Custom dimensions ensure perfect fit for any design concept.
Majen follows eco-friendly quarrying methods, recycling water and minimizing waste. Each slab is ethically sourced and finished to support sustainable architectural practices.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled tumbled vein cut travertine is ideal for outdoor patios, pool decks, courtyards, garden pathways, and rustic interiors. Its naturally slip-resistant surface performs well in both wet and dry areas. The stone’s open pores regulate temperature and humidity, while the aged finish complements organic materials like wood and metal — perfect for sustainable, nature-inspired architecture.
TextSection.text2: The tumbled finish enhances the stone’s natural charm, creating rounded edges and a soft touch that feels inviting underfoot. Open pores remain visible, adding authenticity and breathability. Majen’s precise calibration ensures even thickness, easy installation, and visual continuity. The result is a stone that feels both ancient and enduring — elegant, durable, and rich in natural texture.
TextSection.text3: Unfilled tumbled travertine is available in beige, ivory, cream, and light walnut tones, all defined by the stone’s unique vein patterns. The tumbling process slightly softens color contrasts and textures, producing a gentle, aged surface with natural elegance. Subtle variations across slabs ensure each installation is distinctive, evoking warmth, history, and timeless authenticity.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Durability
TextSection.text4: These tiles are low-maintenance and built to last. Cleaning with neutral pH products preserves their natural texture, while periodic sealing helps minimize dust and moisture absorption. The unfilled surface breathes naturally, preventing humidity buildup and promoting longevity. With proper care, Majen’s unfilled tumbled travertine maintains its rustic beauty and structural integrity for generations.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen is a direct quarry exporter with decades of expertise in natural stone craftsmanship. Each tile undergoes careful selection for vein clarity, texture balance, and strength. With FOB and CIF global delivery, secure wooden packaging, and responsive logistics, Majen guarantees consistent, high-quality supply for architects, builders, and distributors worldwide.

seo.title: Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Stone Supplier – Majen
seo.description: Explore Majen’s cross cut travertine tiles – premium cloudy-pattern slabs for walls, floors, and interiors. Sustainably sourced, precisely cut, and globally exported with outstanding quality.

cross-cut.title: Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
cross-cut.intro: Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen reveal the natural beauty of travertine through a cloudy, soft pattern that highlights the stone’s internal texture. Each slab is sliced perpendicular to the bedding layers, resulting in a unique, cloud-like appearance that brings warmth and calmness to any architectural space. Ideal for modern homes, hotels, and commercial interiors, Majen’s cross-cut travertine offers timeless style, durability, and global appeal.
cross-cut.intro2: Cross cut travertine is formed when the stone is sliced across its bedding plane, exposing circular and irregular patterns instead of linear veins. This natural formation creates a smooth, cloud-like design that enhances light and adds visual softness to interior and exterior spaces. Cross cut travertine is ideal for those seeking a neutral, organic aesthetic that complements both contemporary and traditional designs.
cross-cut.desc: Large-size blocks selected at the quarry with consistent character.

TextSection.text1: Cross cut travertine tiles are a favorite for flooring, wall cladding, countertops, and bathroom interiors. Their soft pattern harmonizes with various design palettes and enhances spatial depth. This stone’s neutral tones make it suitable for both residential and commercial environments, offering natural beauty that endures. When used in large areas, the pattern continuity creates a luxurious yet balanced aesthetic.
TextSection.text2: Majen’s cross cut travertine comes in a spectrum of beige, ivory, cream, and walnut tones. Each slab features organic, cloud-like movement and color transitions that create an inviting, natural warmth. These tonal variations ensure every project has its own identity, from minimalist modern designs to rustic architectural concepts — always retaining the timeless elegance of natural travertine.
TextSection.text3: Cross cut travertine requires minimal maintenance when properly sealed. Routine cleaning with a neutral pH solution keeps the surface looking pristine. Its dense structure makes it resistant to wear, moisture, and temperature changes. With proper sealing and care, Majen’s travertine tiles maintain their smooth surface and natural beauty for decades, even in high-traffic or humid environments.
TextSection.header4: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Supplier?
TextSection.text4: Majen is a trusted Turkish natural stone producer specializing in travertine quarrying and export. By managing every stage from quarry to shipment, Majen ensures top quality, consistent color matching, and reliable supply for international projects. Offering FOB and CIF shipping, secure packaging, and responsive service, Majen stands as a dependable partner for architects, builders, and distributors worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein-Cut
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What distinguishes cross cut from vein cut travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: Cross cut travertine reveals soft, cloudy textures formed perpendicular to the veins, while vein cut shows linear patterns. Cross cut is ideal for a more subtle, balanced look.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Is cross cut travertine suitable for outdoor use?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Yes. With proper sealing, it performs well in outdoor settings like terraces, pathways, and façades. The tumbled or brushed finish provides excellent slip resistance.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: What thicknesses are available?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Standard sizes include 2 cm and 3 cm slabs, with custom dimensions available upon request. Majen offers bespoke production for architectural projects.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_header: How should I clean cross cut travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Clean using a soft cloth and pH-neutral stone cleaner. Avoid harsh chemicals or acidic solutions to preserve the stone’s natural structure and finish.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: Does Majen offer wholesale and export options?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Yes, Majen exports globally with FOB and CIF terms, providing fast shipment, safe packaging, and full export documentation.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_header: Which finish is best for high-moisture areas?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Honed and filled finishes are recommended for bathrooms and kitchens, offering a smooth, sealed surface that resists water absorption and staining.

variants.title: Surface Finishes and Design Possibilities
variants.text: Majen’s cross cut travertine tiles are available in multiple finishes: honed, polished, brushed, tumbled, and filled. Each treatment gives a distinct texture and reflectivity, allowing architects to achieve different visual effects. Polished finishes bring out subtle tonal variations, while honed or brushed surfaces provide a natural, matte feel. Every slab undergoes precision calibration for consistent thickness and smooth installation.

description: Majen’s cross cut travertine features organic clouds and subtle tonal shifts that bring depth and sophistication to interiors. The natural patterning provides a warm and timeless character suitable for both modern and classical designs.

Advanced cutting and calibration technology ensure uniform thickness, precise edges, and easy installation. Every tile is inspected for surface quality and tone harmony, guaranteeing high performance and consistent appearance in every project.

Majen operates with sustainable quarry practices—water recycling, efficient energy use, and responsible extraction. Our approach minimizes environmental impact while ensuring long-term resource preservation and global compliance standards.

Each order is securely packed in reinforced crates and moisture-protected for long-distance transport. Majen’s export team manages full documentation, customs, and logistics to deliver your travertine tiles safely to any destination.

seo.title: Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Matte Elegance – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled honed cross cut travertine tiles feature open pores, matte finish, and cloudy texture. Modern, natural, and globally exported for luxury interiors.

unfilled-honed.h1: Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-honed.title: Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-honed.lead: Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen blend natural authenticity with refined matte elegance. Each tile retains its open pores for organic depth, while the honed finish delivers a smooth, velvety texture. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds a soft, natural rhythm, making these tiles ideal for contemporary and minimalist interiors that value calm and timeless sophistication.
unfilled-honed.intro: Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen blend natural authenticity with refined matte elegance. Each tile retains its open pores for organic depth, while the honed finish delivers a smooth, velvety texture. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds a soft, natural rhythm, making these tiles ideal for contemporary and minimalist interiors that value calm and timeless sophistication.
unfilled-honed.title2: What Are Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-honed.intro2: Unfilled honed travertine is produced by cutting the stone across its bedding layers to expose cloudy patterns, then honing the surface for a soft matte feel. The open pores remain visible, enhancing natural character. This combination creates a balanced texture that feels grounded yet modern — perfect for tranquil architectural and interior spaces.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Design Options
variants.text: Majen offers unfilled honed cross cut travertine tiles in a wide range of sizes: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″,and Versailles Set. Larger slabs emphasize pattern continuity, while smaller tiles add detail and texture variation. Custom sizes are available for architects and designers requiring unique dimensions.

description: The honed surface provides a refined, elegant matte texture that enhances natural colors while keeping reflections low — ideal for calm, modern environments.
Unfilled pores highlight the stone’s raw character and depth, offering a natural feel that connects indoor spaces with authentic, earthy beauty.
The cross-cut orientation reveals soft, cloud-like patterns instead of straight veins, adding gentle motion and balance to contemporary designs.
Majen follows sustainable quarrying, water recycling, and low-emission finishing practices, ensuring eco-responsible stone production for global projects.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled honed cross cut travertine is ideal for interior floors, wall panels, bathrooms, and luxury lobbies. Its matte texture reduces glare while providing a tactile, grounded feel. The natural pores and cloudy pattern create visual balance and warmth, perfectly suited for modern homes, resorts, and boutique commercial designs that emphasize organic simplicity.
TextSection.text2: The honed surface offers a smooth, non-reflective finish that enhances the natural tones of travertine without gloss. The open pores add authentic texture and breathability, giving each slab a handcrafted appeal. Majen’s advanced calibration ensures even thickness and precise edges, allowing for flawless installation and a refined, contemporary aesthetic.
TextSection.text3: Available in ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut tones, unfilled honed cross cut travertine tiles present warm neutrality and subtle depth. The matte finish enhances the stone’s soft hues, while the cloudy pattern provides natural fluidity. This timeless color palette complements modern minimalist and organic interior concepts beautifully.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Durability
TextSection.text4: Unfilled honed travertine is durable and easy to maintain. Clean with neutral pH cleaners to preserve tone and texture. Optional sealing is recommended for areas exposed to moisture. The honed surface hides fingerprints and dust effectively, maintaining a clean, natural look that matures gracefully over time.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen ensures quality and consistency through direct quarry sourcing, precision finishing, and sustainable production. Each tile is inspected for pattern harmony, tone consistency, and dimensional accuracy. With FOB and CIF delivery, eco-conscious quarrying, and reliable international logistics, Majen provides excellence to clients worldwide.

16x16.lead: Majen’s 16″x16″ Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles combine smooth refinement with natural authenticity. Each tile is unfilled, retaining open pores for breathability, and honed to create a soft matte surface that balances light and texture. The cross-cut orientation displays cloudy, organic movement with natural harmony. Available in Ivory, Light, and Walnut, these tiles provide timeless character and subtle elegance for both modern and rustic interiors.
16x16.intro: Majen’s 16″x16″ Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles combine smooth refinement with natural authenticity. Each tile is unfilled, retaining open pores for breathability, and honed to create a soft matte surface that balances light and texture.
16x16.intro2: 16″x16″ Unfilled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles are ideal for floors, bathrooms, kitchens, and walls. The unfilled surface preserves raw stone texture, while the honed finish creates a smooth yet naturally matte feel. Perfect for Mediterranean, contemporary, and rustic designs, these tiles emphasize understated luxury and organic calm.
16x16.text3:
Majen’s 16″x16″ travertine tiles are available in 2 cm and 3 cm thickness options, suitable for wall and floor installations.

💵 Average Export Pricing:
• USD 25–55 /m² (2 cm)
• USD 35–65 /m² (3 cm)

Each tile is honed, tone-calibrated, and inspected for texture consistency. Pricing depends on tone variation, batch uniformity, and export logistics.
16x16.h4: Technical Features: Unfilled • Honed • Cross Cut
16x16.text4:
• Unfilled: Natural pores kept open for authentic texture and air circulation.
• Honed: Matte-smooth finish enhances subtle elegance without gloss.
• Cross Cut: Cloudy, non-directional pattern adds organic balance and visual depth.

Together, these attributes create a soft, tactile surface blending nature and modern craftsmanship.
16x16.text5:
Ivory: Soft creamy beige tone — bright and refined for natural light-filled interiors.

Light: Beige-gray neutral hue — calm, contemporary, and balanced for minimalist elegance.

Walnut: Rich brown-beige tone — warm, grounded, and inviting for classic rustic spaces.

All tones are batch-calibrated and honed for consistent surface smoothness and natural depth.

seo.title: Filled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Matte Finish – Majen
seo.description: Explore Majen’s filled honed cross cut travertine tiles — smooth matte surface, cloud-like pattern, and timeless natural elegance. Ideal for luxury interiors and global export.

filled-honed.h1: Filled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-honed.title: Filled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-honed.lead: Filled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen offer a perfect balance of natural warmth and refined smoothness. Each slab is filled to ensure a dense, durable structure, then honed for a soft matte finish. The cross-cut pattern reveals cloud-like textures that bring harmony and elegance to modern interiors. Ideal for walls, floors, and commercial projects seeking timeless sophistication.
filled-honed.intro: Filled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen offer a perfect balance of natural warmth and refined smoothness. Each slab is filled to ensure a dense, durable structure, then honed for a soft matte finish. The cross-cut pattern reveals cloud-like textures that bring harmony and elegance to modern interiors. Ideal for walls, floors, and commercial projects seeking timeless sophistication.
filled-honed.title2: What Are Filled Honed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-honed.intro2: Cross cut travertine is sliced perpendicular to its natural bedding veins, exposing cloudy, circular patterns instead of linear ones. When combined with filling and honing, this method creates a smooth yet naturally dynamic surface. Filled honed cross cut travertine delivers a subtle, organic appearance — perfect for contemporary architecture, boutique interiors, and spaces that embrace natural tranquility.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Customization
variants.text: Majen offers filled honed cross cut travertine tiles in the following standard sizes: 8″×8″, 12″×12″, 12″×24″, 16″×16″, 18″×18″, 24″×24″, 24″×48″, 48″×110″, and Versailles Set. Custom sizes can be produced upon request to match architectural needs. Large slabs emphasize flow and openness, while smaller tiles allow detailed pattern work and visual balance.

description: The honed surface gives the tiles a refined, soft texture that enhances comfort and visual calmness. Perfect for spaces seeking modern sophistication and natural beauty.
Natural pores are sealed during production to create a denser, smoother surface. This process improves durability, reduces maintenance, and ensures long-term resilience.
The cross-cut orientation reveals soft, cloud-like patterns instead of linear veins. This design adds visual depth and balance to interior spaces, enhancing harmony and tranquility.
Majen follows sustainable quarrying, efficient water recycling, and eco-friendly packaging — ensuring ethical sourcing and environmental responsibility in every slab.

TextSection.text1: Filled honed vein cut travertine is ideal for interior flooring, wall cladding, bathrooms, lobbies, and countertops. Its linear vein structure complements both modern and classical architecture. Designers appreciate its balance of warmth, texture, and durability — making it suitable for luxury villas, commercial buildings, and hospitality projects that require both visual harmony and practical resilience.
TextSection.text2: The honed finish provides a matte, satin-like texture that feels luxurious underfoot while minimizing glare. The filled surface ensures smoothness by sealing natural cavities, creating uniform consistency across tiles. Each slab is precision-calibrated for even thickness and color harmony. The result is a tactile, elegant surface that’s both functional and visually serene.
TextSection.text3: Available in beige, ivory, light walnut, and cream, filled honed cross cut travertine tiles radiate natural warmth. The cloudy movement within the stone adds softness and depth, while the honed surface enhances color uniformity. Each piece displays gentle tonal transitions, creating a relaxing atmosphere ideal for spa-style interiors and elegant modern homes.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Durability
TextSection.text4: Filled honed travertine requires minimal maintenance. Regular cleaning with a neutral pH cleaner keeps the surface smooth and fresh. The filled cavities prevent dust buildup, while honing ensures slip resistance and easy care. Occasional resealing extends its lifespan, preserving natural beauty and surface strength for both residential and commercial environments.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Stone Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen ensures excellence from quarry to export. Each tile is sourced, filled, and honed under strict quality control to maintain tone consistency and durability. With FOB and CIF global delivery options, reinforced wooden packaging, and sustainable quarrying practices, Majen provides reliable service and premium travertine for international architectural projects.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What is the difference between cross cut and vein cut travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: Cross cut reveals cloudy, irregular patterns, while vein cut shows linear veins. Cross cut offers a softer, more balanced aesthetic ideal for contemporary interiors.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: What makes filled honed travertine unique?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: The filled surface improves durability and smoothness, while the honed finish delivers a matte texture that enhances natural light without glare.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Where can I use filled honed cross cut travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: It’s ideal for walls, floors, bathrooms, and large indoor spaces where a modern yet natural appearance is desired.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Standard sizes range from 8″x8″ to 48″x110″, with Versailles sets and custom dimensions available upon request.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: How should I maintain honed travertine surfaces?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Clean regularly with neutral cleaners and reseal periodically to preserve texture and prevent stains. Avoid harsh chemicals or acidic solutions.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Yes. Majen provides international delivery with FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced packaging, and complete export documentation.
