seo.title: Filled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Glossy Natural Elegance – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled polished cross cut travertine tiles feature a glossy finish and cloud-like texture. Elegant, durable, and ideal for luxury interiors and architectural projects.

filled-polished.h1: Filled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-polished.title: Filled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-polished.lead: Filled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen radiate timeless luxury and natural harmony. Each slab is filled for a dense, smooth structure, then polished to achieve a high-gloss finish that enhances the stone’s cloudy cross-cut pattern. Ideal for walls, floors, and luxury interiors, these tiles bring elegance, warmth, and reflective brilliance to modern architectural designs.
filled-polished.intro: Filled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen radiate timeless luxury and natural harmony. Each slab is filled for a dense, smooth structure, then polished to achieve a high-gloss finish that enhances the stone’s cloudy cross-cut pattern. Ideal for walls, floors, and luxury interiors, these tiles bring elegance, warmth, and reflective brilliance to modern architectural designs.
filled-polished.title2: What Are Filled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-polished.intro2: Filled polished travertine is produced by filling the stone’s natural pores for strength and polishing its surface to a mirror-like sheen. The cross-cut orientation exposes organic, cloud-like patterns instead of linear veins. The result is a luminous, soft-toned stone that combines natural tranquility with refined sophistication — perfect for high-end residential and commercial applications.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Custom Options
variants.text: Majen offers filled polished cross cut travertine tiles in various standard sizes: 8″×8″, 12″×12″, 12″×24″, 16″×16″, 18″×18″, 24″×24″, 24″×48″, 48″×110″, and Versailles Set. Each format allows creative layout flexibility — large tiles for seamless designs and smaller tiles for geometric patterns. Custom sizes and thicknesses are available upon request to meet architectural needs.

description: The polished surface enhances the stone’s natural light reflection and depth, adding elegance and luminosity to interiors. Perfect for high-end modern or classical spaces.
The filled process seals natural pores, increasing density and strength. This ensures smooth, resilient surfaces that are easy to clean and maintain over time.
The cross-cut pattern reveals soft, organic clouds instead of veins, offering a serene and fluid visual effect ideal for calming, luxurious environments.
Majen sources responsibly, recycles water during production, and ensures low-impact quarrying. Global logistics and reinforced packaging ensure safe worldwide delivery.

TextSection.text1: Filled polished cross cut travertine is perfect for luxury interiors, hotel lobbies, bathroom walls, countertops, and feature floors. Its reflective surface enhances ambient light and adds a sense of spaciousness. The filled base ensures structural stability and easy cleaning, while the polished finish makes every project feel bright, refined, and timelessly elegant.
TextSection.text2: The polished surface amplifies natural color tones and reveals the cloudy patterns unique to cross-cut travertine. Filled pores create smooth continuity, while the high-gloss finish reflects light beautifully across surfaces. Each slab is precision-calibrated for thickness and tone consistency, ensuring seamless installation. The result: pure sophistication balanced by natural serenity.
TextSection.text3: These tiles feature natural shades of ivory, beige, cream, and walnut, showcasing soft transitions within the stone’s cloudy texture. The polished finish deepens the colors, adding dimension and vibrancy. Each tile reflects light uniquely, creating luxurious atmospheres where modern refinement meets natural artistry.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Longevity
TextSection.text4: Filled polished travertine is durable and easy to maintain. Clean regularly with a neutral pH cleaner to keep its gloss. The filled surface prevents dirt buildup and moisture penetration, ensuring lasting beauty. Occasional resealing helps maintain shine and durability, making it a practical choice for luxury environments worldwide.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen provides premium quality through direct quarry sourcing, sustainable production, and international logistics expertise. Every tile is inspected for polish depth, tone uniformity, and surface clarity. With FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced wooden packaging, and dependable delivery, Majen stands as a trusted partner for global architectural and design professionals.

seo.title: Unfilled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Glossy Natural Texture – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled polished cross cut travertine tiles feature open pores, glossy finish, and cloudy natural texture. Elegant, authentic, and globally exported.

unfilled-polished.h1: Unfilled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-polished.title: Unfilled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-polished.lead: Unfilled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen showcase the harmony between natural authenticity and radiant luxury. Each slab maintains its open pores and natural breathability, while the polished surface adds brilliance and depth. The cloudy cross-cut pattern creates a fluid, elegant texture that enhances interiors with timeless sophistication and warmth.
unfilled-polished.intro: Unfilled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen showcase the harmony between natural authenticity and radiant luxury. Each slab maintains its open pores and natural breathability, while the polished surface adds brilliance and depth. The cloudy cross-cut pattern creates a fluid, elegant texture that enhances interiors with timeless sophistication and warmth.
unfilled-polished.title2: What Are Unfilled Polished Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-polished.intro2: Unfilled polished travertine is created by slicing the stone across its bedding layers to reveal cloudy patterns, then polishing the surface to a high sheen while keeping the pores open. This combination offers a rare contrast — raw texture beneath a reflective surface. The result is a natural stone that radiates elegance and depth, perfect for refined, nature-inspired designs.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Customization
variants.text: Majen offers unfilled polished cross cut travertine tiles in multiple standard sizes: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″,and Versailles Set. Large slabs emphasize flowing cloud patterns, while smaller formats offer intricate detail. Custom dimensions and thicknesses are available upon request for architectural precision.

description: The polished finish highlights the stone’s cloudy patterns while maintaining open pores, creating a luminous, naturally textured surface for elegant interior spaces.
Cross-cut travertine reveals soft, organic clouds instead of veins, bringing calmness and native flow to both traditional and modern design styles.
The unfilled surface allows air circulation, maintaining the stone’s authenticity and stability — ideal for native, sustainable architectural applications.
Majen’s production process minimizes waste and carbon impact through efficient resource management and responsible quarrying practices.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled polished cross cut travertine tiles are ideal for walls, feature floors, hotel lobbies, residential interiors, and decorative surfaces. Their glossy finish reflects natural light, adding spaciousness and vibrancy. The cloudy pattern and natural pores provide depth and authenticity, making these tiles a premium choice for architects seeking elegance grounded in nature.
TextSection.text2: The polished finish amplifies the stone’s natural colors and highlights the cloudy formations of cross-cut travertine. The open pores preserve the stone’s character and enhance light play, creating a multidimensional surface. Each tile is precisely calibrated for smooth installation, ensuring a luxurious yet natural finish suitable for modern and classic interiors alike.
TextSection.text3: These tiles feature warm tones of ivory, beige, and cream, enriched by the polishing process, which enhances their natural vibrancy. The cross-cut orientation reveals soft, cloud-like movement, giving spaces visual balance and warmth. Each piece reflects unique mineral variations, adding depth, luxury, and individuality to every design.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Surface Care
TextSection.text4: Unfilled polished travertine is durable and easy to maintain. Clean with a neutral pH cleaner to preserve its shine and tone. The open pores allow natural air exchange, helping prevent humidity buildup. Occasional sealing enhances protection without diminishing gloss. With proper care, these tiles retain brilliance and strength for decades.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Global Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen ensures exceptional quality from quarry to export. Each tile is hand-inspected for clarity, color harmony, and polish depth. With FOB and CIF international shipping, reinforced wooden packaging, and sustainable quarrying practices, Majen delivers premium natural stone trusted by global architects and distributors.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq_span1: Vein Cut Travertine Tiles
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What defines unfilled polished cross cut travertine tiles?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: They feature open pores and a polished finish, combining raw natural texture with luxurious sheen and cloudy cross-cut patterns.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Where can these tiles be used?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Perfect for interior walls, floors, hotel lobbies, and feature areas where natural luxury and brightness are desired.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Does polishing close the natural pores?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: No. The surface is polished while keeping pores open, allowing breathability and maintaining natural authenticity.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_header: How do I clean polished travertine?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Use a neutral pH stone cleaner and a soft cloth. Avoid acidic or abrasive products to preserve the surface’s natural shine.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: What sizes and finishes are available?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Sizes range from 8″x8″ to 48″x110″, plus Versailles sets. Majen also provides honed, brushed, and tumbled finishes upon request.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Yes. Majen exports worldwide under FOB and CIF terms, offering reliable delivery, reinforced packaging, and full export documentation.

seo.title: Filled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Natural Warm Texture – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled brushed cross cut travertine tiles combine tactile softness with natural cloud-like patterns. Durable, elegant, and globally exported for refined interiors.

filled-brushed.h1: Filled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-brushed.title: Filled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-brushed.lead: Filled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen combine tactile warmth with refined natural beauty. Each slab is filled to enhance density and durability, then brushed to reveal soft, subtle texture. The cross-cut pattern highlights cloud-like movement, creating a harmonious and inviting surface ideal for both classic and contemporary interior designs.
filled-brushed.intro: Filled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen combine tactile warmth with refined natural beauty. Each slab is filled to enhance density and durability, then brushed to reveal soft, subtle texture. The cross-cut pattern highlights cloud-like movement, creating a harmonious and inviting surface ideal for both classic and contemporary interior designs.
filled-brushed.title2: What Are Filled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-brushed.intro2: Filled brushed travertine is produced by filling natural pores for a smoother surface, then brushing it gently to bring out the stone’s organic depth. The cross-cut method exposes cloudy patterns rather than linear veins, resulting in a balanced, soft aesthetic. This combination makes the tiles perfect for architectural spaces seeking texture, warmth, and natural character.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Design Options
variants.text: Majen offers filled brushed cross cut travertine tiles in these standard formats: 8″×8″, 12″×12″, 12″×24″, 16″×16″, 18″×18″, 24″×24″, 24″×48″, 48″×110″, and Versailles Set. Each size option supports creative layouts — from linear patterns to geometric compositions. Custom dimensions can be produced upon request to accommodate global architectural specifications.

description: The brushed finish enhances the stone’s tactile depth, providing a comfortable, soft surface that feels naturally elegant and warm underfoot — perfect for modern rustic spaces.
Filling the natural pores increases the stone’s density, creating a smoother surface with improved durability and easier installation for both interior and exterior projects.
The cross-cut orientation showcases organic, cloud-like movement that softens interiors. This unique visual pattern adds calmness and character to any architectural design.
Majen’s sustainable quarrying and processing minimize environmental impact through efficient energy use and water recycling, ensuring responsible stone sourcing for every slab.

TextSection.text1: Filled brushed cross cut travertine is ideal for interior flooring, wall coverings, spa areas, lobbies, and residential spaces. Its brushed texture provides natural slip resistance and a warm, soft touch underfoot. The stone’s cloud-like pattern creates an inviting atmosphere, blending beautifully with natural materials like wood and metal in modern rustic designs.
TextSection.text2: The brushed finish enhances the stone’s natural tactile quality, giving it a subtly worn, comfortable feel. The filled structure ensures smooth installation and resistance to wear, while the cloudy cross-cut pattern adds a calming rhythm. Each tile undergoes precise calibration for consistency, allowing seamless alignment and long-lasting beauty in high-end projects.
TextSection.text3: These tiles feature soft hues of beige, cream, ivory, and light walnut, with gentle tonal transitions across the cloudy pattern. The brushed surface enhances the texture, producing a natural matte glow. This warm palette and organic movement make the stone ideal for serene, earthy interiors inspired by Mediterranean and contemporary design trends.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Surface Care
TextSection.text4: Filled brushed travertine is durable and easy to maintain. Clean regularly with a neutral pH stone cleaner to preserve texture and tone. Occasional sealing prevents moisture absorption and simplifies cleaning. The brushed surface naturally hides minor wear, keeping the stone looking elegant and authentic for years in both residential and commercial environments.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Export Partner?
TextSection.text5: Majen combines quarry expertise, sustainable production, and precision finishing to deliver world-class travertine. Each tile is inspected for tone, pattern, and calibration accuracy. With FOB and CIF export terms, reinforced wooden packaging, and efficient logistics, Majen ensures smooth and reliable international deliveries with consistent premium quality.

seo.title: Filled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Organic Matte Finish – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled natural cross cut travertine tiles combine cloud-like texture with natural matte beauty. Durable, authentic, and ideal for modern and rustic interiors worldwide.

filled-natural.h1: Filled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-natural.title: Filled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-natural.lead: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen offer the perfect harmony between natural aesthetics and structural performance. Each tile is filled for durability and density, yet retains its authentic, unpolished surface texture. The linear vein patterns create a sense of rhythm and balance, ideal for architectural spaces seeking understated elegance. These tiles bring organic beauty, warmth, and timeless design to any global project.
filled-natural.intro: Filled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen combine raw beauty with structural precision. Each tile is filled to enhance surface strength and uniformity, while the natural, unpolished texture preserves the stone’s authentic charm. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds visual calm and natural depth, making these tiles ideal for serene interiors and timeless architectural spaces.
filled-natural.title2: What Are Filled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-natural.intro2: Filled natural travertine is created by sealing the stone’s natural pores while leaving the surface unpolished for a soft, organic look. The cross-cut direction exposes gentle, cloudy patterns, offering a subtle, harmonious aesthetic. This combination provides durability with an authentic feel — perfect for contemporary spaces inspired by natural materials and balanced design.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Options
variants.text: Majen offers filled natural cross cut travertine tiles in standard formats: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″, and Versailles Set. These size options enable creative layout possibilities — small tiles emphasize texture detail, while large slabs highlight pattern continuity. Custom sizes are also available for bespoke architectural applications.

description: The filled surface ensures durability and uniformity, while the natural finish keeps the stone’s authentic charm — offering a perfect balance between practicality and elegance.
The cross-cut orientation reveals subtle cloudy formations, adding movement and visual depth to interiors. Ideal for spaces that value organic harmony and balance.
Soft beige, ivory, and cream tones create a soothing color palette that complements modern minimalist and rustic architectural styles alike.
Majen ensures eco-responsible quarrying, efficient water recycling, and safe global export. Every slab is processed and packed to meet international standards.

TextSection.text1: Filled natural cross cut travertine tiles are perfect for interior floors, wall coverings, spa areas, lobbies, and outdoor patios. Their matte natural texture provides warmth and organic character, while the filled surface delivers practical strength. These tiles are popular among architects for creating minimalist, natural, and sustainable interiors with timeless elegance.
TextSection.text2: The natural finish showcases the travertine’s raw texture and color variations while the filled pores ensure smoothness and easier upkeep. Each slab displays cloud-like movement that enhances architectural flow and light diffusion. Majen’s precision finishing guarantees consistent calibration, ensuring effortless installation and long-lasting beauty for both modern and classic designs.
TextSection.text3: These tiles are available in ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut tones. The cross-cut pattern enhances subtle tonal transitions, while the natural finish softens reflections for a calm and organic atmosphere. Each slab’s cloudy movement and warm palette bring timeless beauty to modern interiors and nature-inspired architectural spaces.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Durability
TextSection.text4: Filled natural travertine requires minimal maintenance while offering long-term durability. Cleaning with a neutral pH stone cleaner preserves its matte texture and natural color. Periodic sealing helps protect the filled surface from moisture and stains. With proper care, these tiles maintain their natural aesthetic and resilience for decades.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen combines quarry expertise, sustainable production, and precision finishing to deliver unmatched travertine quality. Every tile undergoes detailed inspection for tone harmony, filling accuracy, and textural consistency. With FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced packaging, and global logistics, Majen ensures reliable worldwide supply for architects and builders.

seo.title: Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Raw Authentic Texture – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled natural cross cut travertine tiles feature open pores, raw texture, and cloudy patterns. Pure, breathable stone ideal for natural, timeless interiors.

unfilled-natural.h1: Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-natural.title: Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-natural.lead: Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen capture the pure essence of natural stone. Each tile retains its open pores and raw texture, preserving the stone’s organic beauty. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds softness and movement, creating serene, authentic interiors. Perfect for designers seeking balance between natural imperfection and timeless elegance.
unfilled-natural.intro: Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen capture the pure essence of natural stone. Each tile retains its open pores and raw texture, preserving the stone’s organic beauty. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds softness and movement, creating serene, authentic interiors. Perfect for designers seeking balance between natural imperfection and timeless elegance.
unfilled-natural.title2: What Are Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-natural.intro2: Unfilled natural travertine is sliced across its bedding layers, exposing unique cloudy patterns formed over millennia. Unlike filled or polished variants, it keeps its open pores and unpolished surface, offering full authenticity. The result is a natural, breathable stone that embodies texture, depth, and harmony — ideal for rustic or eco-conscious architectural designs.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Customization
variants.text: Majen offers unfilled natural cross cut travertine tiles in these standard sizes: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″, and Versailles Set. Tiles can be produced in custom sizes upon request. Large slabs emphasize pattern fluidity, while smaller tiles highlight texture variations and organic detailing.

description: Unfilled natural travertine preserves the stone’s original pores and texture, offering a raw, authentic surface that connects design with nature.
The cut orientation reveals cloudy formations and soft transitions, bringing natural rhythm and harmony to interior and exterior designs.
Available in soft beige, ivory, and cream hues — perfect for minimalist, Mediterranean, or rustic designs emphasizing warmth and calmness.
Majen ensures sustainable extraction and processing through energy-efficient systems, responsible water use, and environmentally friendly quarrying practices.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled natural cross cut travertine is perfect for outdoor terraces, courtyards, interior walls, garden pathways, and feature panels. Its naturally slip-resistant surface and cloudy aesthetic make it ideal for both traditional and modern rustic spaces. Designers appreciate its texture and visual calm, especially in environments inspired by nature and handcrafted materials.
TextSection.text2: The unfilled natural surface preserves the stone’s tactile roughness and subtle color variations. Each slab is unique, showcasing light, cloud-like transitions. The open pores enhance breathability, allowing natural air flow. Majen ensures precise cutting and calibration for easy installation without compromising the material’s raw integrity. The finish feels genuine, organic, and timeless.
TextSection.text3: Available in ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut tones, these tiles express natural harmony and warmth. The cloudy cross-cut pattern brings gentle motion and organic variation, while the natural finish softens reflections. Each piece tells a geological story, making it perfect for sustainable, nature-driven architectural projects
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Surface Care
TextSection.text4: Unfilled natural travertine is easy to maintain with basic care. Clean using a neutral pH stone cleaner to preserve its tone and texture. Sealing is optional but recommended for high-moisture areas to prevent dust or water absorption. Over time, the stone develops a natural patina, enhancing its authentic, timeless appeal.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Trusted Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen directly sources its travertine from premium Turkish quarries, ensuring consistent quality, color, and strength. Each tile is inspected for pattern harmony and dimensional precision. With FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced packaging, and eco-conscious production, Majen ensures reliable, sustainable delivery to architects and clients worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Suitable for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as walls, patios, courtyards, and feature areas with natural aesthetics.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Does it require sealing?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Sealing is optional but helps reduce moisture absorption and dust accumulation, especially in high-traffic or wet areas.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Majen provides standard sizes from 8″x8″ to 48″x110″, plus Versailles sets and custom dimensions for bespoke projects.

8x8.lead: Majen’s 8″x8″ Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles embrace pure authenticity and natural craftsmanship. Each tile preserves the stone’s original texture with open pores and a raw matte finish. The cross-cut orientation highlights cloudy, organic movement, offering harmony and visual softness. Available in Ivory, Light, and Walnut, these compact tiles bring rustic beauty and tactile richness to both traditional and contemporary designs.
8x8.intro: Majen’s 8″x8″ Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles embrace pure authenticity and natural craftsmanship. Each tile preserves the stone’s original texture with open pores and a raw matte finish. The cross-cut orientation highlights cloudy, organic movement, offering harmony and visual softness. Available in Ivory, Light, and Walnut, these compact tiles bring rustic beauty and tactile richness to both traditional and contemporary designs.
8x8.intro2: 8″x8″ Unfilled Natural Cross Cut Travertine Tiles are ideal for bathrooms, kitchens, backsplashes, and accent walls. The natural and unfilled surface delivers a raw aesthetic with natural porosity and organic warmth. The cross-cut pattern adds subtle texture and depth, making these tiles perfect for Mediterranean, rustic, or wabi-sabi interiors emphasizing material authenticity.
8x8.text3:
Majen’s 8″x8″ travertine tiles are available in 2 cm and 3 cm thickness options, ideal for walls and decorative surfaces.

💵 Average Export Pricing:
• USD 25–45 /m² (2 cm)
• USD 35–55 /m² (3 cm)

Each tile is tone-calibrated for natural color consistency, with no resin fill to maintain authentic porosity. Pricing may vary depending on tone uniformity, order volume, and logistics.
8x8.h4: Technical Features: Unfilled • Natural • Cross Cut
8x8.text4:
• Unfilled: Natural pores remain open for full texture visibility and raw authenticity.
• Natural: Untreated matte finish enhances tactile quality and stone’s natural tone.
• Cross Cut: Cloudy, non-linear patterning adds organic calm and visual balance.

Together, these features provide a raw, textural experience perfect for naturalistic and organic design styles.
8x8.text5:
Ivory: Soft creamy beige with cloudy veining — pure and timeless for classic natural interiors.

Light: Beige-gray tone with smooth texture — neutral and soothing for minimalist rustic designs.

Walnut: Warm beige-brown hue — rich and earthy, ideal for cozy, organic spaces.

All tones are naturally finished and tone-calibrated for consistency and authenticity across each batch.

seo.title: Unfilled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Warm Natural Texture – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled brushed cross cut travertine tiles feature open pores, tactile surface, and cloudy texture. Natural, warm, and durable — ideal for global interiors.

unfilled-brushed.h1: Unfilled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-brushed.title: Unfilled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-brushed.lead: Unfilled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen combine natural authenticity with warm, tactile beauty. Each tile retains its open pores for breathability while the brushed surface enhances texture and softness. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds calm movement and depth, creating interiors that blend rustic charm with refined elegance.
unfilled-brushed.intro: Unfilled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen combine natural authenticity with warm, tactile beauty. Each tile retains its open pores for breathability while the brushed surface enhances texture and softness. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds calm movement and depth, creating interiors that blend rustic charm with refined elegance.
unfilled-brushed.title2: What Are Unfilled Brushed Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-brushed.intro2: Unfilled brushed travertine is created by cutting the stone across its natural layers, leaving pores open while brushing the surface to highlight natural texture. The result is a stone that feels aged yet contemporary, with visible cloud-like movement. This balance of raw authenticity and comfort makes it ideal for organic, modern, and sustainable designs.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Design Flexibility
variants.text: Majen produces unfilled brushed cross cut travertine tiles in a variety of sizes: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″,and Versailles Set. Larger slabs emphasize cloud movement, while smaller formats highlight texture and rhythm. Custom sizes are available to meet architectural project requirements.

description: The brushed finish reveals the stone’s organic texture and tactile warmth. It feels soft and inviting underfoot, creating a sense of natural comfort and elegance.
The open pores allow natural air exchange, enhancing indoor climate comfort. This feature makes the tiles ideal for eco-conscious, sustainable architecture.
Cross-cut travertine displays soft, cloudy formations instead of straight veins, bringing gentle motion and calm visual balance to interior designs.
Majen practices responsible quarrying and efficient water recycling, ensuring long-term sustainability while maintaining world-class product quality.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled brushed cross cut travertine is ideal for interior floors, wall claddings, spas, patios, and decorative facades. Its subtle texture provides natural slip resistance, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor projects. Designers appreciate its ability to add warmth and natural harmony to modern rustic or minimalist spaces.
TextSection.text2: The brushed finish enhances the stone’s natural grain, giving it a soft, velvety touch. The open pores preserve the material’s breathability and organic depth. Each slab features unique cloud-like patterns that interact beautifully with natural light. Majen’s precise calibration ensures smooth installation and long-term performance for any architectural application.
TextSection.text3: Available in ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut, these tiles display delicate tonal transitions that enhance their natural cloud pattern. The brushed finish deepens color contrast while maintaining a matte, organic texture. This harmonious palette creates a timeless, inviting atmosphere for both contemporary and traditional interiors.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Durability
TextSection.text4: Unfilled brushed travertine is naturally durable and easy to maintain. Clean with neutral pH stone cleaner to preserve its tone and texture. Sealing is recommended for extra protection in high-moisture areas. The brushed surface hides minor wear, ensuring that the tiles retain their warm and natural appearance for many years.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen’s direct quarry sourcing, sustainable production, and expert finishing ensure consistent global quality. Each tile is inspected for tone, texture, and dimension. With FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced packaging, and environmentally conscious quarrying, Majen delivers reliable service and premium natural stone to projects worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Brushed finishes are textured and matte, offering warmth and grip, while honed is smooth and polished is glossy.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Majen offers tiles from 8″x8″ to 48″x110″, with Versailles sets and custom sizes available upon request.

seo.title: Filled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Timeless Natural Elegance – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s filled tumbled cross cut travertine tiles feature a soft aged texture and cloudy pattern. Durable, slip-resistant, and ideal for rustic luxury interiors worldwide.

filled-tumbled.h1: Filled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-tumbled.title: Filled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
filled-tumbled.lead: Filled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody natural charm and old-world craftsmanship. Each tile is filled for strength and durability, then tumbled to achieve a soft, aged texture with rounded edges. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds a warm, organic look, making these tiles perfect for rustic interiors, Mediterranean villas, and timeless outdoor spaces.
filled-tumbled.intro: Filled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody natural charm and old-world craftsmanship. Each tile is filled for strength and durability, then tumbled to achieve a soft, aged texture with rounded edges. The cloudy cross-cut pattern adds a warm, organic look, making these tiles perfect for rustic interiors, Mediterranean villas, and timeless outdoor spaces.
filled-tumbled.title2: What Are Filled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
filled-tumbled.intro2: Filled tumbled travertine is produced by filling the stone’s pores for smoothness and tumbling it to soften edges and textures. The cross-cut orientation highlights soft, cloudy movements within the stone. This combination creates a naturally weathered look with enhanced durability — ideal for spaces that blend luxury with natural authenticity.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Options
variants.text: Majen offers filled tumbled cross cut travertine tiles in various formats: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″, and Versailles Set. Each format allows diverse design flexibility — small sizes emphasize detail, while large slabs highlight cloudy movement. Custom dimensions can be produced to suit project-specific requirements.

description: The tumbled finish softens edges and textures, creating an antique aesthetic that adds character and warmth to any space — perfect for rustic or Mediterranean designs.
The filled process seals natural pores, improving surface density and stability. This ensures long-lasting strength and easy upkeep for both interior and exterior applications.
Cross-cut travertine reveals gentle cloud-like textures instead of straight veins, creating visual harmony and movement across walls and floors.
Majen’s eco-conscious production minimizes waste and energy usage. Each slab is responsibly sourced and prepared for a more sustainable architectural future.

TextSection.text1: Filled tumbled cross cut travertine tiles are ideal for patios, bathrooms, living areas, pool decks, courtyards, and feature walls. Their slip-resistant surface and muted texture make them suitable for indoor and outdoor environments. The combination of durability and rustic beauty creates harmony in natural and contemporary architectural styles alike.
TextSection.text2: The tumbled finish provides a warm, tactile feel, while the filled surface ensures easy maintenance and smoothness. The subtle rounding of edges adds an antique charm, ideal for projects seeking an aged aesthetic. Each tile is precision-calibrated for consistent thickness and tone. The final effect is an inviting, natural surface that feels timeless and enduring.
TextSection.text3: These tiles are available in beige, cream, ivory, and light walnut tones, each enriched with natural cloud formations unique to cross-cut travertine. The tumbled finish softens color contrasts and enhances depth. This natural palette complements rustic, coastal, and heritage-inspired interiors, bringing warmth and harmony to architectural spaces.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Longevity
TextSection.text4: Filled tumbled travertine requires simple maintenance. Cleaning with a neutral pH stone cleaner preserves its authentic finish. The filled surface minimizes dirt accumulation, while tumbling reduces sharp edges and wear. With occasional sealing, these tiles remain resilient and elegant, aging gracefully over time with enhanced texture and natural patina.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Export Partner?
TextSection.text5: Majen controls every step from quarry to export, ensuring superior quality and consistency. Each tile is inspected for texture, tone, and filling precision. With FOB and CIF shipping, reinforced packaging, and sustainable quarrying methods, Majen guarantees global reliability and premium standards trusted by architects and designers worldwide.

seo.title: Unfilled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles | Rustic Natural Elegance – Majen
seo.description: Majen’s unfilled tumbled cross cut travertine tiles combine open pores, aged texture, and cloudy patterns. Naturally slip-resistant and perfect for timeless rustic designs.

unfilled-tumbled.h1: Unfilled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-tumbled.title: Unfilled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles
unfilled-tumbled.lead: Unfilled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody natural authenticity and timeless charm. Each tile retains its open pores for organic breathability while being tumbled to achieve a soft, aged texture with rounded edges. The cloudy cross-cut pattern enhances warmth and fluidity, making these tiles ideal for rustic interiors, Mediterranean homes, and outdoor living spaces.
unfilled-tumbled.intro: Unfilled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles by Majen embody natural authenticity and timeless charm. Each tile retains its open pores for organic breathability while being tumbled to achieve a soft, aged texture with rounded edges. The cloudy cross-cut pattern enhances warmth and fluidity, making these tiles ideal for rustic interiors, Mediterranean homes, and outdoor living spaces.
unfilled-tumbled.title2: What Are Unfilled Tumbled Cross Cut Travertine Tiles?
unfilled-tumbled.intro2: Unfilled tumbled travertine is cut across its natural layers to reveal cloudy, flowing patterns and then tumbled for a weathered, handcrafted finish. The open pores maintain the stone’s natural breathability and texture. This combination delivers a naturally aged, soft-touch surface that adds character, comfort, and authenticity to every architectural project.

variants.title: Available Sizes and Customization
variants.text: Majen offers unfilled tumbled cross cut travertine tiles in the following standard sizes: 8″x8″, 12″x12″, 12″x24″, 16″x16″, 18″x18″, 24″x24″, 24″x48″, 48″x110″,and Versailles Set.Custom dimensions are also available upon request. Large slabs emphasize flowing patterns, while small tiles highlight texture detail for intricate layouts.

description: The tumbled finish gives each tile a soft, weathered appearance with rounded edges, offering rustic elegance and a comfortable, organic surface feel.
Unfilled travertine maintains its natural pores, allowing air and moisture exchange for a naturally balanced and eco-friendly architectural material.
The cross-cut pattern reveals soft, cloud-like formations across the surface, creating harmony, warmth, and visual depth in interior and exterior spaces.
Majen’s quarry operations prioritize sustainability with water recycling, energy efficiency, and environmentally conscious stone processing.

TextSection.text1: Unfilled tumbled cross cut travertine tiles are ideal for patios, gardens, pool decks, courtyards, interior walls, and rustic floors. Their non-slip texture and open pores make them perfect for wet or outdoor areas. Designers value their ability to create timeless, natural atmospheres with warmth and Mediterranean elegance across residential and commercial spaces.
TextSection.text2: The tumbled surface provides a tactile, inviting feel with gently worn edges and subtle color transitions. The open-pore texture adds authenticity and natural ventilation. Each tile’s cloudy pattern offers depth and calm movement. Majen’s precision cutting ensures even thickness and easy installation, achieving harmony between rustic charm and structural excellence.
TextSection.text3: These tiles feature soft, earthy tones — ivory, beige, cream, and light walnut. The cross-cut design brings out cloud-like formations, while the tumbled finish softens color contrast for an aged, organic look. Each slab’s tone variation adds authenticity, making it perfect for timeless, natural, and cozy architectural environments.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Longevity
TextSection.text4: Unfilled tumbled travertine is easy to care for and built to last. Cleaning with neutral pH stone cleaner maintains its texture and tone. Sealing is recommended for additional protection in humid or high-traffic areas. Over time, the stone develops a graceful patina, enhancing its rustic charm while maintaining durability for decades.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Travertine Supplier?
TextSection.text5: Majen’s direct quarry sourcing, precision finishing, and sustainable production guarantee consistent quality. Each tile is inspected for tone balance, surface texture, and dimensional accuracy. With FOB and CIF export options, reinforced packaging, and global delivery expertise, Majen ensures reliable, environmentally responsible supply worldwide.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Yes. Its tumbled texture offers excellent traction and weather resistance, making it perfect for exterior spaces.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Absolutely. Majen exports globally under FOB and CIF terms, with reinforced packaging and reliable delivery logistics.

Ideal for Mediterranean, farmhouse, and traditional interiors, these tiles enhance comfort and organic flow.

Together, these features create an antique, natural stone look with authentic texture and enduring appeal.

Ivory: Creamy beige tone — bright, elegant, and perfect for classic natural settings.

Light: Beige-gray tone — subtle, neutral, and ideal for contemporary rustic interiors.

Walnut: Warm aged brown — rich, earthy, and full of Mediterranean warmth.

Each color batch is tumbled and tone-calibrated for consistency and a naturally aged finish.

seo.title: Wholesale Travertine Tiles Blaundos Antico | Majen
seo.description: Rustic, elegant Blaundos Antico travertine tiles from Turkey. Quarry‑direct, A‑grade, export‑ready. Finishes, sizes, and global delivery by Majen.

antiko.title: Wholesale Travertine Tiles Blaundos Antico
antiko.intro: Blaundos Antico travertine tiles feature warm beige tones and an antique character that adds depth and authenticity to interior and exterior spaces. Sourced directly from our Uşak–Ulubey region, Majen supplies wholesale tiles graded for tone harmony and dimensional accuracy. Designers specify this variety for floors, walls, and feature surfaces where rustic elegance meets modern performance. Reinforced packaging, clear documentation, and reliable lead times make it project‑ready for global delivery.
antiko.alt: Wholesale Blaundos Antiko travertine tiles from Turkey
antiko.title2: Why Choose Blaundos Antico Travertine Tiles?
antiko.intro2: Blaundos Antico stands out with tactile textures and nuanced veining that create a timeless atmosphere. Its earthy palette pairs naturally with wood, metal, and plaster finishes. With quarry‑direct sourcing, Majen controls selection and grading across lots, ensuring consistent tone and surface quality. Flexible MOQs and competitive pricing support both boutique and multi‑phase programs. Samples and QC reports help teams approve materials quickly with confidence.
description: Why choose Blaundos Antiko tiles: antique-inspired look, expressive veining, bookmatch options and strong continuity on large surfaces. Excellent balance of authenticity and durability for premium interiors.

Sourced and processed in Uşak–Ulubey. Used in island countertops, bathroom vanities, reception desks, wall cladding, elevator surrounds and luxury retail fixtures. Shade-verified lots for consistent project outcomes.

cards.text1: From rustic villas to contemporary hospitality, these tiles balance character and calm. Use smaller formats for patterns (herringbone, French pattern) or large formats for clean, modern layouts. Available finishes expand possibilities—honed for subtle elegance, brushed or tumbled for texture and outdoor traction, polished for select statement zones where sheen is desired.
cards.text2: Calibrated thickness and stable geometry support tight joints and level surfaces in lobbies, corridors, and residential spaces. Proper sealing enhances stain resistance indoors; textured finishes improve slip confidence in wet areas and outdoors. Consistency across lots reduces on‑site adjustments and supports predictable schedules for contractors and installers.

ApplicationSection.title: Applications of Blaundos Antico Travertine Tiles
ApplicationSection.text: Ideal for floors, wall cladding, showers, kitchen splashes, fireplace surrounds, and outdoor terraces. The antique texture enriches boutique hotels and homes, while honed finishes suit refined interiors. Coordinated formats and trims enable visual continuity across rooms and from interior to exterior spaces, supporting cohesive design language throughout the project.'
ApplicationSection.subtitle: Interior & Exterior Use Cases
ApplicationSection.subtext: Indoors, honed tiles deliver soft matte refinement; in bathrooms and kitchens, sealers support maintenance. Outdoors, brushed or tumbled textures age gracefully and retain color clarity on paths and patios. With consistent tone and calibrated edges, installers achieve neat grout lines and predictable waste rates in both residential and commercial settings.

AvailableSection.title: Available Sizes & Thickness
AvailableSection.text: Common tile sizes include modular sets (French pattern), 30×60, 60×60, and larger formats where feasible. Standard thicknesses are around 10–12 mm, with other options upon request. Tiles are cut, calibrated, and chamfered as needed to support clean alignment and safe edges. Book‑matched features are available for special walls using coordinated slabs and tiles.
AvailableSection.subtitle: Dimensional Tolerances
AvailableSection.subtext: Thickness control, surface regularity, and square geometry reduce lippage risk and support reliable adhesion over large areas. For exterior installations, we coordinate with contractors on substrate prep, movement joints, and drainage. Measurements are verified before dispatch; dimensional reports can be provided for submittals and QA documentation when requested.

FinishesSection.title: Finishes & Packaging Options
FinishesSection.text: Choose honed for low‑glare sophistication, brushed or tumbled for tactile character and traction, and polished where sheen is desired indoors. Finishes are applied with calibrated equipment to keep tone and sheen consistent across lots. For export, tiles are packed in reinforced wooden crates with corner guards and moisture‑resistant wraps, optimized for container loading and long‑distance sea freight.
FinishesSection.subtitle: Surface Finish Guidance
FinishesSection.subtext: We guide finish selection by location, foot traffic, and maintenance goals. Multi‑finish sample sets help stakeholders preview appearance under project lighting, aligning expectations early and minimizing change orders.
FinishesSection.subtext2: Crates are measured and photographed prior to loading. Internal dividers and protective interlayers minimize vibration and abrasion. Crate IDs map to packing lists for fast checks at customs and on site; optional shock indicators are available on request.

PartnerSection.title: Why Partner with Majen for Travertine Tiles?
PartnerSection.description: Beyond quarry access, Majen offers technical guidance, flexible MOQs, and dependable lead times. Direct sourcing supports cost control and tone matching across lots. Reinforced packaging, thorough documentation, and responsive support reduce friction through shipping and receiving, helping projects finish on brief and on time.
PartnerSection.text1: Fast sampling, mock‑ups, and practical installation advice keep decisions informed. Multilingual communication and transparent timelines align stakeholders from specification to handover.
PartnerSection.text2: Responsible quarrying, water recycling, and waste reduction are prioritized. Traceability and documentation support green building goals and ESG policies.'
PartnerSection.text3: Packing data, certificates of origin, and HS codes are provided; optional lab tests and slip ratings can be arranged to simplify submittals and approvals.

ExportSection.title: Travertine Tile Export Process
ExportSection.text: Majen manages quarry selection, cutting, finishing, inspection, and documentation. Orders include commercial invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin. Under FOB or CIF terms, logistics coordinates bookings, customs, and container optimization. Pre‑shipment photos and QC summaries add transparency for remote teams and keep programs on schedule.

QualitySection.title: Quality Control & Grading of Tiles
QualitySection.text: Tiles are graded for thickness accuracy, surface finish, tone consistency, porosity, and structural soundness. Natural features are mapped; pieces outside A‑grade expectations are removed from high‑visibility lots. Calibrated honing/brushing ensures uniform texture. Detailed grading reports and photos can be shared for remote validation prior to shipment.
QualitySection.subtitle: Inspection Criteria
QualitySection.subtext: Inspection verifies dimensions, flatness, edge quality, fill integrity, and finish continuity. Pattern compatibility and tone harmony are checked to support pleasing layouts. Documentation captures measurements and observations for submittals and warranties, lowering on‑site risk and supporting consistent installation outcomes.

TextSection.text1: Coordinate tiles with Blaundos Antico slabs for feature walls or counters. Explore Blaundos Light and Blaundos Ivory for brighter schemes. Pair with trims and thresholds to maintain continuity across rooms and between indoor and outdoor spaces.
TextSection.text2: Ideal for kitchen islands, vanities and lobby walls. Pair with vein-cut bookmatch for dramatic continuity; specify 20–30 mm for interiors, 30+ mm for high-stress zones.
TextSection.text3: Reinforced A-frames, corner and moisture protection, photo-documented loading and shared seal numbers. FOB İzmir or CIF to major ports.

items.q: Can Blaundos Antico tiles be used in wet areas?
items.a: Yes. Use brushed or tumbled textures and appropriate sealing for showers, entries, and pool surrounds.

items.q: What are common tile sizes and thicknesses?
items.a: Popular sizes include French pattern, 30×60 and 60×60; typical thickness is around 10–12 mm. Custom formats may be available on request.
Honed, brushed, tumbled, and polished (for select interiors). We help match finishes to traffic and maintenance requirements.
Yes. We ship under FOB or CIF terms with full documentation and logistics support.

items.q: How are tiles packaged for export?
items.a: In reinforced wooden crates with dividers, interlayers, corner guards, and moisture‑resistant wraps.

Designers specify this variety for modern floors, walls, and exteriors where clarity and warmth are desired. Reinforced packaging, clear documentation, and reliable lead times make it export‑ready for global projects.
light.title2: Why Choose Blaundos Light Travertine Tiles?
light.intro2: Blaundos Light stands out with its bright palette that reflects light and enlarges spaces. Its subtle movement ensures calm, refined surfaces that complement wood, brass, and dark metal accents. With quarry‑direct sourcing, Majen ensures consistent tone and grade across lots. Flexible MOQs, competitive pricing, and sample boards streamline specification and approval.
light.alt: Wholesale Blaundos Light travertine slabs from Turkey
description: Balanced warmth and brightness—pairs well with wood and neutral palettes.
Favored for counters, wall cladding and reception desks; consistent lots for large areas.

cards.text1: The neutral base supports minimalist and Scandinavian schemes, but also balances rich materials like walnut, porcelain, or brass. Available finishes—honed, brushed, tumbled, and polished—expand indoor and outdoor uses. Large format tiles create sleek expanses; modular patterns deliver classic detail. Book‑matched options support striking feature walls
cards.text2: Calibrated thickness and geometry reduce lippage risk and support smooth planes in lobbies, corridors, and homes. Proper sealing enhances stain resistance indoors; textured finishes improve slip resistance outdoors. Consistency across lots lowers on‑site adjustments, supporting predictable budgets and schedules.

ApplicationSection.title: Applications of Blaundos Light Travertine Slabs
ApplicationSection.text: Suitable for floors, walls, bathrooms, kitchens, fireplace surrounds, stair treads, and outdoor terraces. The luminous tone suits bright interiors, while brushed or tumbled finishes enrich outdoor patios and pool surrounds. Coordinated trims and slabs enable visual continuity across rooms and inside‑out transitions in residential and commercial projects.
ApplicationSection.subtitle: Interior & Exterior Use Cases
ApplicationSection.subtext: Indoors, honed tiles deliver soft refinement, while polished finishes provide premium sheen. In bathrooms and kitchens, sealing supports easy maintenance. Outdoors, brushed or tumbled surfaces age gracefully and retain clarity. Coordinated tile and slab formats ensure cohesive design across public and private spaces.

AvailableSection.title: Available Sizes & Thickness
AvailableSection.text: Standard sizes include 30×60, 60×60, and modular French patterns, with larger formats on request. Typical thickness ranges from 10–12 mm. Tiles are cut, calibrated, and chamfered to ensure safe edges and clean joints. Book‑matched sets and cut‑to‑size features can be produced for special applications in walls and counters.
AvailableSection.subtitle: Dimensional Tolerances
AvailableSection.subtext: Thickness control, surface regularity, and squareness ensure reliable installation across large areas. For exterior settings, we coordinate with contractors on substrate prep, expansion joints, and drainage. Measurements are verified before dispatch; dimensional reports are available for submittals and QA documentation.'

FinishesSection.title: Finishes & Packaging Options
FinishesSection.text: Choose honed for subtle elegance, brushed or tumbled for outdoor grip, and polished for high‑end interiors. All finishes are applied with calibrated machinery to ensure tone and sheen consistency. For export, tiles are packed in reinforced wooden crates with internal dividers, moisture protection, and optimized loading for sea freight.'
FinishesSection.subtitle: Surface Finish Guidance
FinishesSection.subtext: Finish choice depends on traffic, lighting, and maintenance goals. We provide sample sets across finishes to help stakeholders preview results under project lighting, reducing approval time and surprises during installation.
FinishesSection.subtext2: Crates are photographed and logged before shipping. Internal blocking and separators minimize vibration and abrasion. Each crate ID is linked to packing lists for easy customs clearance and on‑site checks. Optional shock indicators can be added.

ExportSection.title: Travertine Tile Export Process
ExportSection.text: Majen oversees the export process: quarry selection, cutting, finishing, inspection, and documentation. Orders include invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin. Under FOB or CIF terms, logistics coordinates bookings, customs, and container optimization. Pre‑shipment QC photos provide transparency for buyers

QualitySection.title: Quality Control & Grading of Tiles
QualitySection.text: Blaundos Light tiles are graded for thickness, finish, tone consistency, and structural soundness. Natural features are mapped; sub‑A pieces are excluded from premium lots. Calibrated finishes ensure uniform appearance. Grading reports and photos can be shared for remote approvals.'
QualitySection.subtitle: Inspection Criteria
QualitySection.subtext: Inspection covers dimensions, flatness, edge quality, and tone harmony. Pattern alignment and finish continuity are checked to ensure seamless installation. Documentation provides traceability for submittals and warranties.

PartnerSection.text1: We provide rapid sampling, mock‑ups, and installation guidance. Multilingual communication and transparent timelines keep projects aligned from tender to completion.

PartnerSection.text3: Packing data, certificates of origin, and HS codes are provided. Optional slip tests and lab reports can be arranged for submittals and compliance.

TextSection.text1: Pair Blaundos Light tiles with slabs for feature walls or counters. Explore Blaundos Ivory for creamy tones or Blaundos Antico for rustic character. Coordinate trims and thresholds to ensure seamless inside‑out design.'

pavers.title: Wholesale Travertine Pavers
pavers.intro: Travertine pavers are a timeless choice for outdoor surfaces, offering durability, elegance, and a natural non-slip texture. As a global travertine supplier, Majen delivers premium-quality pavers sourced from Turkey’s finest quarries. Designed for pool decks, patios, and walkways, our travertine ensures lasting performance and aesthetic appeal in every climate.
pavers.title2: Why Choose Travertine Pavers for Your Outdoor Projects?
pavers.intro2: Travertine’s natural cooling effect, high slip resistance, and rich color palette make it the preferred material for outdoor applications. Its porous texture keeps surfaces cool underfoot, even in warm climates. Compared to concrete or porcelain, travertine pavers maintain color depth and texture over time, ensuring both functionality and visual luxury for high-end landscape designs.
description: Travertine pavers withstand heavy foot traffic and extreme weather. Their dense structure resists cracks, ensuring long-lasting performance for outdoor spaces worldwide.
The naturally textured surface of travertine provides excellent slip resistance, making it ideal for pool decks, patios, and other wet environments.
Available in warm beiges, cool silvers, and golden tones, travertine pavers create elegant outdoor aesthetics that match any design concept.
With minimal upkeep, travertine pavers retain their natural beauty. Regular sealing enhances protection while preserving their luxurious finish.

variants.heading: Travertine Special Desing Varieties
variants.text: Majen offers three primary types of Wholesale Travertine Special Designs: Blaundos Antiko, Blaundos Light, and Blaundos Ivory. Each variety is crafted with precision at our Uşak–Ulubey quarry, ensuring durability, consistent texture, and aesthetic value. Export-ready and reinforced for sea freight, these bespoke travertine designs are trusted by architects, importers, and wholesalers worldwide.

TextSection.text1: Majen supplies travertine pavers to architects, wholesalers, and contractors across 35+ countries. Our export network ensures reliable logistics, safe packaging, and consistent product quality from quarry to container. Whether you need bulk shipments for distribution or customized cuts for architectural projects, our team manages every stage of the process with precision and care.
TextSection.text2: Our travertine pavers come in multiple standard and custom sizes: 6x12”, 8x16”, and 12x24”, with thickness options from 3 cm to 5 cm. Surface finishes include tumbled, brushed, and honed textures, ideal for various outdoor applications. Each stone is carefully processed to achieve the perfect balance of natural beauty and slip resistance.
TextSection.text3: Travertine pavers are widely used in pool decks, driveways, courtyards, walkways, and terraces. Their ability to stay cool and resist moisture makes them the perfect outdoor paving solution. Whether you’re designing a modern resort or a classic villa garden, travertine’s versatility complements every architectural style.
TextSection.header4: Sustainability & Long-Term Value
TextSection.text4: As a naturally sourced material, travertine offers an eco-friendly alternative to manufactured pavers. With minimal processing, it retains its natural beauty and reduces environmental impact. Its long lifespan, low maintenance needs, and timeless appearance make travertine pavers a sustainable investment for global projects.
TextSection.header5: Partner with Majen: Your Trusted Travertine Supplier
TextSection.text5: At Majen, we combine local quarry expertise with global distribution power. Our focus on consistent quality, fair pricing, and reliable export timelines makes us a trusted partner for wholesalers and large-scale contractors. From sampling to shipment, we ensure your travertine pavers arrive on time and exceed expectations.
TextSection.subtext1: Average block size is 280×220×200 cm with natural surfaces. Export-ready, suitable for bulk orders, with reinforced packaging for container loading.
TextSection.subtext2: Countertops, wall cladding, flooring, and exterior façades where durability and natural elegance are required.
TextSection.subtext3: Polished, honed, tumbled, and brushed surfaces to match diverse design requirements and performance needs.
TextSection.subtext4: Custom designs elevate aesthetics and provide exclusive solutions while preserving travertine’s natural durability and texture.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: Travertine pavers are ideal for pool decks, patios, garden paths, and driveways due to their natural slip resistance and thermal comfort.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Yes, Majen exports globally, with clients in North America, Europe, and the Middle East. We handle all shipping and customs documentation.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: We offer pavers in 6x12”, 8x16”, and 12x24” sizes, with 3–5 cm thickness. Custom dimensions are available for bulk orders.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Travertine offers superior aesthetics, natural cooling, and longevity compared to artificial alternatives like concrete or porcelain.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_header: Are travertine pavers suitable for cold climates?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Yes, properly sealed travertine performs well even in freeze-thaw conditions, maintaining durability and appearance.

seo.title: Vein Cut Travertine Pavers | Global Exporter of Premium Outdoor Stone
seo.description: Discover premium vein cut travertine pavers for outdoor designs. Durable, non-slip, and globally supplied directly from Turkish quarries.

vein-cut.desc: Vein Cut Travertine Pavers reveal the natural linear veins of the stone, creating a striking, continuous flow across surfaces. Ideal for wall cladding, flooring, and large-format designs that emphasize movement and depth.
vein-cut.title: Vein Cut Travertine Pavers
vein-cut.intro: Vein cut travertine pavers feature a linear pattern created by cutting the stone along its natural veins, delivering a modern and elegant look for outdoor areas. Ideal for pool decks, patios, and pathways, this style emphasizes texture and movement. Majen supplies globally, offering premium vein cut pavers that blend durability, non-slip safety, and visual continuity for luxury projects.
vein-cut.title2: What Makes Vein Cut Travertine Unique?
vein-cut.intro2: Unlike cross-cut travertine, vein cut travertine highlights the stone’s natural layers, creating striking lines and grain flow. This formation provides a sense of depth and sophistication, making it a top choice for designers seeking architectural harmony. The material’s density and subtle variation make it durable and elegant for outdoor and indoor use alike.

TextSection.text1: Majen ensures top-tier export standards for vein cut travertine pavers. Every batch is inspected for thickness accuracy, color uniformity, and finish precision. Our logistics network supports worldwide shipping, with reinforced packaging that guarantees safe delivery. As a trusted quarry-direct supplier, we maintain a consistent production flow for global clients in hospitality and construction industries.
TextSection.text2: Filled vein cut travertine offers smoother textures and enhanced color consistency. Available in Honed, Polished, Brushed, Tumbled, and Natural finishes, these options are ideal for refined outdoor designs and high-end architecture. Filled finishes minimize surface pores, ensuring denser structure and low maintenance for pool decks, terraces, and walkways.
TextSection.text3: Unfilled vein cut travertine preserves its authentic character and porous surface, adding natural depth and slip resistance. Available in Natural, Honed, Polished, Brushed, and Tumbled, these finishes suit rustic outdoor aesthetics. The unfilled process enhances natural drainage, making it perfect for gardens, driveways, and outdoor living spaces.
TextSection.header4: Sustainability & Stone Integrity
TextSection.text4: Sourced directly from Uşak–Ulubey quarries, vein cut travertine is processed with eco-conscious techniques that minimize waste. Its long-lasting structure reduces replacement needs, promoting sustainable architecture. Each paver reflects nature’s craftsmanship — built to endure heavy use while maintaining timeless beauty across decades of outdoor exposure.
TextSection.header5: Partner with Majen for Global Stone Supply
TextSection.text5: Majen combines quarry expertise, quality control, and efficient export logistics. Our vein cut travertine pavers meet international standards, making us the trusted choice of distributors and contractors worldwide. Partnering with Majen means gaining a reliable stone supplier who ensures consistent quality, transparent communication, and timely delivery on every order.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Standard thickness ranges between 3 cm and 5 cm, suitable for outdoor paving, driveways, and pool decks.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq5_text: Filled surfaces have pores sealed for smoother appearance, while unfilled keeps natural texture and drainage.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq6_text: Absolutely. Its refined grain pattern and elegant texture make it ideal for walls, floors, and lobbies.

Our slabs are produced with advanced calibration standards to ensure smooth surfaces, precise thickness, and consistent color tones for global projects.

unfilled-honed.intro2: The honed finish gives travertine a refined, non-reflective surface that enhances color tone and depth. seo.title: Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Pavers | Global Supplier of Polished Outdoor Stone
seo.description: Filled honed vein cut travertine pavers for pool decks and patios. Smooth texture, sealed durability, and global export by Majen.

filled-honed.h1: Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Pavers
filled-honed.title: Filled Honed Vein Cut Travertine Pavers
filled-honed.lead: Filled honed vein cut travertine pavers combine the linear elegance of vein cutting with the smooth satin feel of a honed surface. The filling process seals the stone’s natural pores, increasing strength and reducing maintenance. Perfect for patios, pool decks, and terraces, these pavers provide a sleek yet natural look that enhances outdoor luxury projects worldwide.
filled-honed.intro: Filled honed vein cut travertine pavers combine the linear elegance of vein cutting with the smooth satin feel of a honed surface. The filling process seals the stone’s natural pores, increasing strength and reducing maintenance. Perfect for patios, pool decks, and terraces, these pavers provide a sleek yet natural look that enhances outdoor luxury projects worldwide.
filled-honed.title2: The Beauty of Filled Honed Travertine Finish
filled-honed.intro2: The honed finish offers a soft matte surface that reflects minimal light, giving spaces a calm and refined atmosphere. Filling the stone enhances density and creates a smooth, pore-free surface, making it ideal for outdoor flooring where comfort and elegance meet durability. Each tile is precisely cut and calibrated for a seamless, high-end appearance.

variants.title: Surface Characteristics and Texture
variants.text: The filled honed finish gives travertine a velvety touch with reduced glare, providing a balanced aesthetic for modern outdoor and indoor spaces. This process closes natural pores, enhances density, and ensures easy maintenance. Ideal for pool surroundings and patios, it offers both practicality and sophistication in high-traffic environments.

description: The honed finish delivers a soft satin texture and subtle reflection, creating a calm atmosphere perfect for contemporary landscapes and interiors.
Filling the stone’s natural pores improves density and resistance to moisture and wear — ensuring long-lasting strength in demanding outdoor conditions.
From 6″x12″ tiles to 24″x36″ slabs, Majen’s precision cutting ensures perfect alignment, consistent sizing, and flexibility for every project scale.
Eco-conscious quarrying and energy-efficient processing minimize environmental impact while maintaining world-class stone quality.

TextSection.text1: Majen’s filled honed vein cut travertine pavers are sourced from Turkey’s renowned quarries and processed with strict international quality standards. Every slab undergoes thickness calibration, tone inspection, and surface finishing under expert supervision. With FOB and CIF terms, we ensure secure global shipping and on-time delivery for international projects.
TextSection.text2: Majen offers filled honed vein cut travertine pavers in multiple size options, from compact formats to large slabs: 8x8″, 12x12″, 12x24″, 16x16″, 18x18″, 24x24″, 24x48″, 48x110″, and Versailles patterns. Each paver is cut with precision for consistent dimensions and effortless installation across global project scales.
TextSection.text3: Majen practices eco-conscious extraction and manufacturing processes. Our quarrying operations prioritize water recycling, reduced emissions, and efficient material use. Every step — from raw block selection to shipment — meets international environmental and safety standards, ensuring long-term sustainability in global stone supply.
TextSection.header4: Partner with Majen for Premium Travertine Supply
TextSection.text4: With years of expertise and a transparent export network, Majen provides filled honed vein cut travertine pavers that meet the demands of global architecture and design. Our commitment to precision, competitive pricing, and timely logistics positions us as a trusted partner for wholesalers and project developers worldwide.

6x12.h4: Technical Features: Filled • Honed • Vein Cut
6x12.text4:
Filled: Natural pores are sealed with matching travertine filler, improving density and durability while preserving texture.
Honed: The surface is smoothed to a matte, low-gloss finish that enhances tone depth and comfort underfoot.
Vein Cut: Stone is cut parallel to its natural bedding, exposing linear grain patterns for a structured visual rhythm.

6x12.h5: Vein Cut vs Cross Cut • Honed vs Tumbled

Honed vs Tumbled: Honed delivers a refined matte finish with minimal texture; tumbled brings an aged, rustic feel. Choose honed for clean, contemporary elegance.

filled-natural.intro2: Natural travertine surfaces display the stone’s true charm — subtle color transitions, gentle textures, and unique patterns. This finish offers a more rustic and organic appeal compared to polished or honed styles. When filled, it gains additional resilience, making it suitable for outdoor designs that prioritize authenticity and longevity.

variants.title: Surface Characteristics & Texture
variants.text: The filled natural surface retains the stone’s organic texture while improving structural performance. By filling natural pores, Majen increases resistance to moisture, cracking, and surface wear, yet the stone still looks raw, earthy, and hand-selected — ideal for rustic gardens, patios, and outdoor social areas.

description: The filled natural finish preserves the stone’s original look and feel, offering organic beauty ideal for rustic and minimalist designs.
Filling strengthens the structure, sealing pores and protecting the surface from moisture, cracks, and daily outdoor wear.
Available in 6x12", 8x8", 12x12", 12x24", 16x24", 18x36", 24x24", 24x36" and Versailles Set — suitable for global outdoor applications.
Sustainably extracted and minimally processed to reduce environmental impact while keeping authentic travertine aesthetics.

TextSection.text1: Filled natural vein cut travertine is ideal for outdoor flooring, garden paths, patios, terraces, courtyards, and rustic architectural concepts. Its natural surface integrates beautifully with landscaping elements, wooden structures, and Mediterranean or countryside-inspired projects. Designers prefer this finish when they want authenticity without sacrificing durability.
TextSection.text2: Majen offers a complete range of filled natural vein cut travertine sizes, including: 6x12", 8x8", 12x12", 12x24", 16x24", 18x36", 24x24", 24x36" and Versailles Set. All pieces are calibrated and cut with precision, so you can achieve consistent joint lines even when using a finish that visually looks more raw and handcrafted.
TextSection.text3: Majen’s filled natural vein cut travertine pavers present warm beige, ivory, and light cream tones with directional vein movement. Because the surface is kept natural, each piece showcases unique mineral patterns and tonal shifts — creating depth and authenticity across large outdoor areas.
TextSection.header4: Maintenance & Performance
TextSection.text4: Filled natural travertine requires simple maintenance. Regular sweeping and pH-neutral cleaning are sufficient for most outdoor uses. Periodic sealing enhances protection against stains and moisture penetration. Thanks to the filling step, the stone maintains outdoor performance even in demanding climates.
TextSection.header5: Why Choose Majen as Your Trusted Export Partner?
TextSection.text5: Majen sources directly from Turkish quarries and controls the entire production cycle — from extraction to filling, cutting, and final inspection. Each order is packed for export under CIF or FOB terms with reinforced protection, ensuring that natural-surface travertine reaches international clients in perfect condition.
